description:
Savol: Jism qanday tezlik bilan vertikal otilsa, u 6 s dan so‘ng otilgan joyiga qaytib tushadi (m/s)?
A) 20
B) 35
C) 30
D) 40
Yechim: Jismning vertikal yo‘nalishdagi harakati uchun, uchish va tushish vaqtlarining yig‘indisi 6 soniya, ya'ni 3 soniya uchish va 3 soniya tushish bo‘ladi (har bir yo‘nalishda teng vaqt).
Tushish va uchish vaqtining 3 sekundini hisobga olgan holda, erkin tushish tezligi \( g = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 \) yordamida hisoblanadi.
Uchish va tushishning umumiy vaqti \( t = 6 \, 	ext{s} \), va u uchish vaqtining 3 soniyasida maksimal balandlikka yetadi. Vertikal harakat uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi:
   \[v_0 = g 	imes t = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes 3 \, 	ext{s} = 30 \, 	ext{m/s}.\]  Demak, javob C) 30.Savol: Moddiy nuqta 90 sm radiusli aylana bo‘ylab tekis harakatlanmoqda. Agar u 9 s da 90° ga burilgan bo‘lsa, uning burchak tezligi qancha (rad/s)?
A) 10
B) 45
C) π/18
D) 0,56
Yechim: Aylananing to‘liq burilish burchagi \( 2\pi \) radian. Moddiy nuqta 90° (yoki \(  rac{\pi}{2} \) radian) burilgan. Burchak tezligini hisoblash uchun, burchakni vaqtga bo‘lish kerak: 
\[\omega =  rac{\Delta 	heta}{\Delta t} =  rac{ rac{\pi}{2}}{9 \, 	ext{s}} =  rac{\pi}{18} \, 	ext{rad/s}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: Dastlab tinch turgan 2 kg massali jism 3 N doimiy kuch ta’sirida tezlashmoqda. 6,5 minut vaqt davomida kuch bajargan ishni (kJ) hisoblang.
A) 98
B) 245
C) 342
D) 164
Yechim: Ishni hisoblash uchun quyidagi formula ishlatiladi: \[A = F 	imes d\]. Bu yerda \( F = 3 \, 	ext{N} \) (kuch), \( d \) esa harakat masofasi.
Jismning tezlanishini hisoblash uchun \( F = ma \) formulasidan foydalanamiz: \[a =  rac{F}{m} =  rac{3 \, 	ext{N}}{2 \, 	ext{kg}} = 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2.\]
Jismning harakatlangan masofasini hisoblash uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi: \[d =  rac{1}{2} a t^2 \]. Bu yerda \( t = 6.5 \, 	ext{min} = 390 \, 	ext{s} \).
\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]
Endi ishni hisoblaymiz: \[A = 3 \, 	ext{N} 	imes 114075 \, 	ext{m} = 342225 \, 	ext{J} = 342.225 \, 	ext{kJ}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: 2,7 kg massali muz boʻlagi ipga shunday osib qoʻyilganki, muzning chorak hajmi suvga botib turibdi. Ipdagi taranglik kuchini toping.
A) 19,5 N
B) 24 N
C) 18 N
D) 14,4 N
Yechim: Gravitatsion kuch: \[F_{	ext{grav}} = m \cdot g = 2,7 \cdot 10 = 27 \, 	ext{N}\]
Arximed kuchi: Muzning botgan hajmi \(  rac{V}{4} \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 1000 \cdot  rac{V}{4} \cdot 10 = 2500 \cdot V\]
Muzning hajmi \( V =  rac{2,7}{900} = 0,003 \, 	ext{m}^3 \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 2500 \cdot 0,003 = 7,5 \, 	ext{N}\]
Taranglik kuchi:\[T = F_{	ext{grav}} - F_{	ext{Arx}} = 27 - 7,5 = 19,5 \, 	ext{N}\] Demak, javob ASavol: 8 m/s tezlik bilan to‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatlanayotgan chang‘ichi 25 s da qancha masofani bosib o‘tadi (m) ?
A) 50
B) 100
C) 150
D) 200
Yechim: To‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatda masofa quyidagi formula bilan hisoblanadi:
\[s = v \cdot t\]
  - \( v \) — tezlik (\( 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),
   - \( t \) — vaqt (\( 25 \, 	ext{s} \)).
Masofani hisoblash:\[s = 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \cdot 25 \, 	ext{s} = 200 \, 	ext{m}\] Demak, javob D.
question: Boshlang‘ich tezliksiz biror balandlikdan erkin tushayotgan jism harakatining oxirgi sekundida qanday masofaga ko‘chadi? Jismning tushish vaqti 19s.
output:
Jismning tushish vaqti \( t = 19 \, 	ext{s} \), shuning uchun oxirgi sekundda u \( t = 18 \, 	ext{s} \) va \( t = 19 \, 	ext{s} \) orasidagi masofani bosib o‘tadi.
Oxirgi sekundda bosib o‘tilgan masofa quyidagi formula bilan hisoblanadi:
\[s =  rac{1}{2} \cdot g \cdot (2t - 1) \cdot 1\]
  - \( g \) — erkin tushish tezlanishi (\( 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 \)),
  - \( t \) — vaqt (\( 19 \, 	ext{s} \)).
Masofani hisoblash:
\[s =  rac{1}{2} \cdot 9.8 \cdot (2 \cdot 19 - 1) = 4.9 \cdot 37 = 181.3 \, 	ext{m}\]
Ya’ni, jism oxirgi sekundda taxminan \( 181 \, 	ext{m} \) masofani bosib o‘tadi. Eng yaqin variant \( 185 \, 	ext{m} \). Demak, javob B.

question: Jism H balandlikdan boshlang‘ich tezliksiz erkin tushayotgan jism harakatning oxirgi sekundida 5H/9 masofani bosib o‘tdi. U qanday balandlikdan tushgan (m)?
output:
Jismning erkin tushishini hisoblash uchun quyidagi formula ishlatiladi: \[s =  rac{1}{2}gt^2\]
Jism harakatning oxirgi sekundida \(  rac{5H}{9} \) masofani bosib o‘tgan. Demak, jismning tushish vaqti \( t = t_1 + 1 \), bunda \( t_1 \) - jismning \(  rac{4H}{9} \) masofani bosib o‘tish vaqti.
\[H =  rac{1}{2}g(t_1 + 1)^2\]
\[ rac{4H}{9} =  rac{1}{2}gt_1^2\]
Ikki tenglama yordamida \( H \) ni topamiz:
\[H =  rac{1}{2}g(t_1 + 1)^2 =  rac{1}{2}g(t_1^2 + 2t_1 + 1)\]
\[H =  rac{1}{2}gt_1^2 + gt_1 +  rac{1}{2}g\]
\[H -  rac{1}{2}gt_1^2 = gt_1 +  rac{1}{2}g\]
\[H -  rac{4H}{9} = gt_1 +  rac{1}{2}g\]
\[ rac{5H}{9} = gt_1 +  rac{1}{2}g\]
\[gt_1 =  rac{5H}{9} -  rac{1}{2}g\]
\[t_1 =  rac{1}{g}( rac{5H}{9} -  rac{1}{2}g)\]
\[t_1^2 =  rac{1}{g^2}( rac{25H^2}{81} -  rac{5H}{9}g +  rac{1}{4}g^2)\]
\[H =  rac{1}{2}g(t_1^2 + 2t_1 + 1)\]
\[H =  rac{1}{2}g[ rac{1}{g^2}( rac{25H^2}{81} -  rac{5H}{9}g +  rac{1}{4}g^2) + 2 \cdot  rac{1}{g}( rac{5H}{9} -  rac{1}{2}g) + 1]\]
\[H =  rac{1}{2}[ rac{25H^2}{81g} -  rac{5H}{9} +  rac{1}{4}g + 2 \cdot  rac{5H}{9g} - 1 + 1]\]
\[H =  rac{1}{2}[ rac{25H^2}{81g} -  rac{5H}{9} +  rac{1}{4}g +  rac{10H}{9g}]\]
\[H =  rac{1}{2}[ rac{25H^2}{81g} +  rac{10H}{9g} -  rac{5H}{9} +  rac{1}{4}g]\]
\[2H =  rac{25H^2}{81g} +  rac{10H}{9g} -  rac{5H}{9} +  rac{1}{4}g\]
\[2H =  rac{25H^2 + 90H - 405H + 81g^2}{162g}\]
\[324Hg = 25H^2 + 90H - 405H + 81g^2\]
\[25H^2 - 639Hg + 81g^2 = 0\]
\[H =  rac{639g \pm \sqrt{639^2g^2 - 4 \cdot 25 \cdot 81g^2}}{2 \cdot 25}\]
\[H =  rac{639g \pm \sqrt{408321g^2 - 8100g^2}}{50}\]
\[H =  rac{639g \pm \sqrt{400221g^2}}{50}\]
\[H =  rac{639g \pm 633g}{50}\]

   \[v_0 = g 	imes t = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes 3 \, 	ext{s} = 30 \, 	ext{m/s}.\]  Demak, javob C) 30.Savol: Moddiy nuqta 90 sm radiusli aylana bo‘ylab tekis harakatlanmoqda. Agar u 9 s da 90° ga burilgan bo‘lsa, uning burchak tezligi qancha (rad/s)?
A) 10
B) 45
C) π/18
D) 0,56
Yechim: Aylananing to‘liq burilish burchagi \( 2\pi \) radian. Moddiy nuqta 90° (yoki \(  rac{\pi}{2} \) radian) burilgan. Burchak tezligini hisoblash uchun, burchakni vaqtga bo‘lish kerak: 
\[\omega =  rac{\Delta 	heta}{\Delta t} =  rac{ rac{\pi}{2}}{9 \, 	ext{s}} =  rac{\pi}{18} \, 	ext{rad/s}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: Dastlab tinch turgan 2 kg massali jism 3 N doimiy kuch ta’sirida tezlashmoqda. 6,5 minut vaqt davomida kuch bajargan ishni (kJ) hisoblang.
A) 98
B) 245
C) 342
D) 164
Yechim: Ishni hisoblash uchun quyidagi formula ishlatiladi: \[A = F 	imes d\]. Bu yerda \( F = 3 \, 	ext{N} \) (kuch), \( d \) esa harakat masofasi.
Jismning tezlanishini hisoblash uchun \( F = ma \) formulasidan foydalanamiz: \[a =  rac{F}{m} =  rac{3 \, 	ext{N}}{2 \, 	ext{kg}} = 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2.\]
Jismning harakatlangan masofasini hisoblash uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi: \[d =  rac{1}{2} a t^2 \]. Bu yerda \( t = 6.5 \, 	ext{min} = 390 \, 	ext{s} \).
\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]
Endi ishni hisoblaymiz: \[A = 3 \, 	ext{N} 	imes 114075 \, 	ext{m} = 342225 \, 	ext{J} = 342.225 \, 	ext{kJ}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: 2,7 kg massali muz boʻlagi ipga shunday osib qoʻyilganki, muzning chorak hajmi suvga botib turibdi. Ipdagi taranglik kuchini toping.
A) 19,5 N
B) 24 N
C) 18 N
D) 14,4 N
Yechim: Gravitatsion kuch: \[F_{	ext{grav}} = m \cdot g = 2,7 \cdot 10 = 27 \, 	ext{N}\]
Arximed kuchi: Muzning botgan hajmi \(  rac{V}{4} \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 1000 \cdot  rac{V}{4} \cdot 10 = 2500 \cdot V\]
Muzning hajmi \( V =  rac{2,7}{900} = 0,003 \, 	ext{m}^3 \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 2500 \cdot 0,003 = 7,5 \, 	ext{N}\]
Taranglik kuchi:\[T = F_{	ext{grav}} - F_{	ext{Arx}} = 27 - 7,5 = 19,5 \, 	ext{N}\] Demak, javob ASavol: 8 m/s tezlik bilan to‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatlanayotgan chang‘ichi 25 s da qancha masofani bosib o‘tadi (m) ?
A) 50
B) 100
C) 150
D) 200
Yechim: To‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatda masofa quyidagi formula bilan hisoblanadi:
\[s = v \cdot t\]
  - \( v \) — tezlik (\( 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),
   - \( t \) — vaqt (\( 25 \, 	ext{s} \)).
Masofani hisoblash:\[s = 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \cdot 25 \, 	ext{s} = 200 \, 	ext{m}\] Demak, javob D.
question: Biror balandlikdan 20 m/s tezlik bilan gorizontal otilgan jismning uchish uzoqligi, otilish balandligiga teng bo‘lsa, jism qanday balandlikdan otilgan?
output:
Uchish uzoqligi \( L \) va otilish balandligi \( H \) teng. Uchish uzoqligini topish uchun quyidagi formula ishlatiladi:
\[L =  rac{v_0^2 \cdot \sin(2\alpha)}{g}\]
Biroq, bu holda burchak \( \alpha = 0 \) (gorizontal otish), shuning uchun \( \sin(2\alpha) = 0 \) va \( L = 0 \). Buning o‘rniga, gorizontal otish uchun uchish uzoqligini hisoblash uchun quyidagi formula ishlatiladi:
\[L = v_0 \cdot t\]
Bu yerda \( v_0 \) — dastlabki tezlik (\( 20 \, 	ext{m/s} \)), \( t \) — jismning uchish vaqti.
Uchish vaqti \( t \) ni topish uchun vertikal harakat tenglamasidan foydalanamiz:
\[h(t) = h_0 + v_{0y}t -  rac{1}{2}gt^2 = 0\]
Bu yerda \( h_0 \) — dastlabki balandlik (\( H \)), \( v_{0y} \) — vertikal dastlabki tezlik (\( 0 \), chunki gorizontal otish), \( g \) — erkin tushish tezlanishi (\( 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 \)).
\[0 = H + 0 -  rac{1}{2} \cdot 9.8 \cdot t^2\]
\[4.9t^2 = H\]
\[t = \sqrt{ rac{H}{4.9}}\]
Uchish uzoqligi \( L \) uchun formula:
\[L = v_0 \cdot t = 20 \cdot \sqrt{ rac{H}{4.9}}\]
\( L = H \) tengligini qo‘yamiz:
\[20 \cdot \sqrt{ rac{H}{4.9}} = H\]
\[400 \cdot  rac{H}{4.9} = H^2\]
\[400 = 4.9H\]
\[H =  rac{400}{4.9}\]
\[H \approx 81.63 \, 	ext{m}\]
Javob variantlariga yaqinlashsak, \( H \approx 80 \, 	ext{m} \) deb aytish mumkin.
Demak, javob B.

question: 10 m/s tezlik bilan uchib borayotgan granata portlab, 0,6 kg va 0,4 kg massali bo‘laklarga parchalangan. Granataning katta parchasi dastlabki yo‘nalishda 25 m/s tezlik bilan harakatlangan bo‘lsa, kichik parchaning tezligini (m/s) toping.
output:
Impulsning saqlanish qonunidan foydalanamiz:
\[m_1 \cdot v_1 + m_2 \cdot v_2 = m \cdot v\]
  - \( m_1 = 0.6 \, 	ext{kg} \) — katta parcha massasi,
  - \( m_2 = 0.4 \, 	ext{kg} \) — kichik parcha massasi,
  - \( v_1 = 25 \, 	ext{m/s} \) — katta parcha tezligi,
  - \( v_2 \) — kichik parcha tezligi (topilishi kerak),
  - \( m = 0.6 + 0.4 = 1 \, 	ext{kg} \) — granata massasi,
  - \( v = 10 \, 	ext{m/s} \) — granata dastlabki tezligi.
Tezliklarni almashtiramiz:
\[0.6 \cdot 25 + 0.4 \cdot v_2 = 1 \cdot 10\]
\[15 + 0.4v_2 = 10\]
\[0.4v_2 = 10 - 15\]
\[0.4v_2 = -5\]
\[v_2 = -5 / 0.4\]
\[v_2 = -12.5 \, 	ext{m/s}\]
Minus belgisi kichik parcha dastlabki yo‘nalishga qarshi harakatlanayotganini bildiradi. Demak, javob A.

question: Jism gorizontal sirtda tinch turibdi. Uni joyidan qo‘zg‘atish uchun kerak bo‘ladigan eng kichik 6 N. Jismga gorizontal yo‘nalishda 5 N tashqi kuch qo‘yilsa, unga tezlanish beruvchi (natijaviy) kuch (N) qanday bo‘ladi?
output:
Jismni joyidan siljitish uchun zarur bo'lgan kuch 6 N ekan. Buning ma'nosi jismning tinch holatda ega bo'lgan statik taranglik kuchi 6 N ga teng. 

Jismga 5 N kuch ta'sir etganda, jism hali ham tinch holatda turganligi sababli, statik taranglik kuchi 5 N kuchga qarshi ishlaydi. Natijada, jismga ta'sir etuvchi natijaviy kuch quyidagicha hisoblanadi:

Natijaviy kuch = Tashqi kuch - Statik taranglik kuchi
= 5 N - 6 N
= -1 N

Manfiy belgining ma'nosi shu: natijaviy kuch jismni joyidan siljitish uchun yetarli emas, chunki u tashqi kuchga qarshi ishlaydigan statik taranglik kuchidan kichik. 

Shunday ekan, to'g'ri javob A) -1 N.

question: Tennis to‘pi raketkaga 7,5 m/s tezlik bilan urulib, 12,5 m/s tezlikda qaytgan bo‘lsa, raketkaning tezligi nimaga teng?
output:
Impulsning saqlanish qonunidan foydalanamiz:
\[m_1 \cdot v_1 + m_2 \cdot v_2 = m_1 \cdot v_1' + m_2 \cdot v_2'\]
Bu yerda:
- \( m_1 \) — to‘pning massasi,
- \( m_2 \) — raketkaning massasi,
- \( v_1 \) — to‘pning urilgan tezligi (\( 7.5 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),
- \( v_2 \) — raketkaning dastlabki tezligi (noma’lum),
- \( v_1' \) — to‘pning qaytgan tezligi (\( 12.5 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),
- \( v_2' \) — raketkaning oxirgi tezligi (noma’lum).
To‘p va raketkaning massalari noma’lum, ammo ularning nisbatini hisobga olsak, raketkaning massasi to‘pning massasidan ancha katta. Shuning uchun, to‘pning massasini \( m \) deb, raketkaning massasini \( M \) deb belgilaymiz. 
\[m \cdot 7.5 + M \cdot v_2 = m \cdot (-12.5) + M \cdot v_2'\]
To‘pning qaytgan tezligi manfiy, chunki u teskari yo‘nalishda harakatlanadi.
Raketkaning tezligi \( v_2 \) va \( v_2' \) o‘zgarmasligi uchun, to‘pning impulsining o‘zgarishi raketkaning impulsining o‘zgarishiga teng bo‘lishi kerak:
\[m \cdot 7.5 - m \cdot (-12.5) = M \cdot (v_2' - v_2)\]
\[m \cdot (7.5 + 12.5) = M \cdot (v_2' - v_2)\]
\[m \cdot 20 = M \cdot (v_2' - v_2)\]
Raketkaning massasi ancha katta bo‘lgani uchun, \( M \gg m \), ya’ni \( v_2' - v_2 \) juda kichik. Demak, raketkaning tezligi deyarli o‘zgarmaydi.
Shunday qilib, raketkaning tezligi \( v_2 = v_2' \) ga teng.
\[m \cdot 20 = M \cdot 0\]
\[20 = 0\]
Demak, raketkaning tezligi 0 ga teng. Ya’ni, raketka harakatlanmaydi.
Javob: C) 0

question: Soatning minut strelkasining markazga intilma tezlanishi sekund strelkasining markazga intilma tezlanishidan necha marta farq qiladi. Sekund strelkasi minut strelkasidan 2 marta uzun.
output:
Minut strelkasi sekund strelkasidan 2 marta uzunroq bo'lgani uchun, uning radiusi sekund strelkasining radiusidan 2 marta katta. Markazga intiluvchi tezlanish radiusning kvadratiga teskari proportsionaldir. Demak, agar sekund strelkasining markazga intiluvchi tezlanishi \(a_c\) bo'lsa, minut strelkasiniki \(\frac{a_c}{2^2} = \frac{a_c}{4}\) bo'ladi.
Shuning uchun, sekund strelkasining markazga intiluvchi tezlanishi minut strelkasinikidan 4 marta katta. Boshqacha aytganda, sekund strelkasining markazga intiluvchi tezlanishi minut strelkasinikiga nisbatan 4 marta farq qiladi.
Javob: C) 4

question: Jismga bir vaqtning o‘zida 4 N va 5 N kuchlar ta’sir qilishi mumkin. Quyidagilarning qaysi biri shu kuchlarning teng ta’sir etuvchisi bo‘la olmaydi?
output:
Kuchlarning teng ta’sir etuvchisi 4 N va 5 N kuchlarning vektor yig‘indisiga teng bo‘ladi. Vektor yig‘indisi uchun quyidagi formula ishlatiladi:
\[F_{\text{natija}} = \sqrt{F_1^2 + F_2^2}\]
Bu yerda \( F_1 = 4 \, 	ext{N} \) va \( F_2 = 5 \, 	ext{N} \).
\[F_{\text{natija}} = \sqrt{4^2 + 5^2} = \sqrt{16 + 25} = \sqrt{41} \approx 6.4 \, 	ext{N}\]
Teng ta’sir etuvchi kuch taxminan \( 6.4 \, 	ext{N} \) ga teng. Shu sababli, teng ta’sir etuvchi kuch \( 6 \, 	ext{N} \) ga yaqin bo‘ladi.
Quyidagi variantlarni ko‘rib chiqamiz:
A) \( 7.2 \, 	ext{N} \) — teng ta’sir etuvchidan kattaroq, lekin yaqin.
B) \( 9.5 \, 	ext{N} \) — teng ta’sir etuvchidan ancha katta.
C) \( 1 \, 	ext{N} \) — teng ta’sir etuvchidan ancha kichik.
D) \( 6 \, 	ext{N} \) — teng ta’sir etuvchiga yaqin.
Teng ta’sir etuvchi kuch \( 6.4 \, 	ext{N} \) ga teng bo‘lgani uchun, unga yaqin variant \( 6 \, 	ext{N} \) bo‘ladi. Boshqa variantlar teng ta’sir etuvchiga yaqin emas.
Demak, javob B.

question: Vaznsiz blokning ikki tarafiga o‘zaro ip bilan bog‘langan 400 g va 600 g massali yuklar osilgan. Ipdagi taranglik kuchini (N) toping.
output:
Ipdagi taranglik kuchi tizimning og‘irlik kuchiga teng. Og‘irlik kuchi esa ikki jismning umumiy og‘irlik kuchiga teng. 
\[F = m_1 \cdot g + m_2 \cdot g = (m_1 + m_2) \cdot g\]
Bu yerda:
- \( m_1 = 400 \, 	ext{g} = 0.4 \, 	ext{kg} \),
- \( m_2 = 600 \, 	ext{g} = 0.6 \, 	ext{kg} \),
- \( g = 10 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 \) (erkin tushish tezlanishi).
Taranglik kuchini hisoblaymiz:
\[F = (0.4 + 0.6) \cdot 10 = 1 \cdot 10 = 10 \, 	ext{N}\]
Lekin, vaznsiz blokning ikki tomonida osilgan yuklarning og‘irligi ipdagi taranglik kuchiga ta’sir qilmaydi. Ipdagi taranglik kuchi faqat blokdagi yuklardan kattaroq yukning og‘irligiga teng. 
\[F = m_2 \cdot g = 0.6 \, 	ext{kg} \cdot 10 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 = 6 \, 	ext{N}\]
Demak, javob B.

Yechim: Jismning vertikal yo‘nalishdagi harakati uchun, uchish va tushish vaqtlarining yig‘indisi 6 soniya, ya'ni 3 soniya uchish va 3 soniya tushish bo‘ladi (har bir yo‘nalishda teng vaqt).
Tushish va uchish vaqtining 3 sekundini hisobga olgan holda, erkin tushish tezligi \( g = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 \) yordamida hisoblanadi.
Uchish va tushishning umumiy vaqti \( t = 6 \, 	ext{s} \), va u uchish vaqtining 3 soniyasida maksimal balandlikka yetadi. Vertikal harakat uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi:
   \[v_0 = g 	imes t = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes 3 \, 	ext{s} = 30 \, 	ext{m/s}.\]  Demak, javob C) 30.Savol: Moddiy nuqta 90 sm radiusli aylana bo‘ylab tekis harakatlanmoqda. Agar u 9 s da 90° ga burilgan bo‘lsa, uning burchak tezligi qancha (rad/s)?
A) 10
B) 45
C) π/18
D) 0,56
Yechim: Aylananing to‘liq burilish burchagi \( 2\pi \) radian. Moddiy nuqta 90° (yoki \(  rac{\pi}{2} \) radian) burilgan. Burchak tezligini hisoblash uchun, burchakni vaqtga bo‘lish kerak: 
\[\omega =  rac{\Delta 	heta}{\Delta t} =  rac{ rac{\pi}{2}}{9 \, 	ext{s}} =  rac{\pi}{18} \, 	ext{rad/s}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: Dastlab tinch turgan 2 kg massali jism 3 N doimiy kuch ta’sirida tezlashmoqda. 6,5 minut vaqt davomida kuch bajargan ishni (kJ) hisoblang.
A) 98
B) 245
C) 342
D) 164
Yechim: Ishni hisoblash uchun quyidagi formula ishlatiladi: \[A = F 	imes d\]. Bu yerda \( F = 3 \, 	ext{N} \) (kuch), \( d \) esa harakat masofasi.
Jismning tezlanishini hisoblash uchun \( F = ma \) formulasidan foydalanamiz: \[a =  rac{F}{m} =  rac{3 \, 	ext{N}}{2 \, 	ext{kg}} = 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2.\]
Jismning harakatlangan masofasini hisoblash uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi: \[d =  rac{1}{2} a t^2 \]. Bu yerda \( t = 6.5 \, 	ext{min} = 390 \, 	ext{s} \).
\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]
Endi ishni hisoblaymiz: \[A = 3 \, 	ext{N} 	imes 114075 \, 	ext{m} = 342225 \, 	ext{J} = 342.225 \, 	ext{kJ}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: 2,7 kg massali muz boʻlagi ipga shunday osib qoʻyilganki, muzning chorak hajmi suvga botib turibdi. Ipdagi taranglik kuchini toping.
A) 19,5 N
B) 24 N
C) 18 N
D) 14,4 N
Yechim: Gravitatsion kuch: \[F_{	ext{grav}} = m \cdot g = 2,7 \cdot 10 = 27 \, 	ext{N}\]
Arximed kuchi: Muzning botgan hajmi \(  rac{V}{4} \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 1000 \cdot  rac{V}{4} \cdot 10 = 2500 \cdot V\]
Muzning hajmi \( V =  rac{2,7}{900} = 0,003 \, 	ext{m}^3 \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 2500 \cdot 0,003 = 7,5 \, 	ext{N}\]
Taranglik kuchi:\[T = F_{	ext{grav}} - F_{	ext{Arx}} = 27 - 7,5 = 19,5 \, 	ext{N}\] Demak, javob ASavol: 8 m/s tezlik bilan to‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatlanayotgan chang‘ichi 25 s da qancha masofani bosib o‘tadi (m) ?
A) 50
B) 100
C) 150
D) 200
Yechim: To‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatda masofa quyidagi formula bilan hisoblanadi:
\[s = v \cdot t\]
  - \( v \) — tezlik (\( 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),
   - \( t \) — vaqt (\( 25 \, 	ext{s} \)).
Masofani hisoblash:\[s = 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \cdot 25 \, 	ext{s} = 200 \, 	ext{m}\] Demak, javob D.

question: 2 rad/s burchak tezlik va 9 m/s chiziqli tezlik bilan aylanma harakat qilayotgan jismga ta’sir qiluvchi markazdan qocha kuch 36 N. Jismning massasini (kg) toping.
output:
Markazdan qochma kuch quyidagi formula bilan hisoblanadi:
\[F_{	ext{cp}} = m \cdot \omega^2 \cdot r\]
- \( m \) — jismning massasi (kg),
- \( \omega \) — burchak tezligi (rad/s),
- \( r \) — aylanma radiusi (m).
Chiziqli tezlik \( v \) va burchak tezlik \( \omega \) orasidagi bog‘liqlik:
\[v = \omega \cdot r\]
Berilgan ma’lumotlardan foydalanib, radiusni topamiz:
\[9 \, 	ext{m/s} = 2 \, 	ext{rad/s} \cdot r\]
\[r =  rac{9 \, 	ext{m/s}}{2 \, 	ext{rad/s}} = 4.5 \, 	ext{m}\]
Endi markazdan qochma kuch formulasi yordamida massani topamiz:
\[36 \, 	ext{N} = m \cdot (2 \, 	ext{rad/s})^2 \cdot 4.5 \, 	ext{m}\]
\[36 \, 	ext{N} = m \cdot 4 \cdot 4.5 \, 	ext{m}\]
\[36 \, 	ext{N} = m \cdot 18\]
\[m =  rac{36 \, 	ext{N}}{18} = 2 \, 	ext{kg}\]
Demak, javob C.

question: Sharofiddin umumiy massasi 50 kg bo‘lgan yuk ortilgan aravni o‘zgarmas tezlik bilan itarib ketmoqda. Agar Sharofiddin aravaga 100 N kuch bilan ta’sir qilayotgan bo‘lsa, arava bilan yer orasidagi ishqalaish koeffitsiyentini toping.
output:
Arava o‘zgarmas tezlik bilan harakatlanayotganligi sababli, Sharofiddin ta’sir ettirayotgan kuch ishqalish kuchiga teng bo‘ladi. Ishqalish kuchini topish uchun quyidagi formula ishlatiladi:
\[F_{ishq} = \mu \cdot F_{norm}\]
- \( F_{ishq} \) — ishqalish kuchi,
- \( \mu \) — ishqalish koeffitsiyenti,
- \( F_{norm} \) — normal kuch (jismning og‘irligi).
Aravaning og‘irligi:
\[F_{norm} = m \cdot g = 50 \, 	ext{kg} \cdot 10 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 = 500 \, 	ext{N}\]
Sharofiddin ta’sir ettirayotgan kuch ishqalish kuchiga teng:
\[F_{ishq} = 100 \, 	ext{N}\]
Ishqalish koeffitsiyentini topish uchun:
\[\mu =  rac{F_{ishq}}{F_{norm}} =  rac{100}{500} = 0,2\]
Demak, javob A.

A) 19,5 N

C) 18 N
D) 14,4 N

question: Elastik prujinaga osilgan yukning tebranish amplitudasi 5 sm bo‘lib u 2 s davr bilan tebranmoqda, yukning bir to‘la tebranish davri davomidagi o‘rtacha tezligini toping (sm/s)?

question: Gorizontga nisbatan 45^0 burchak ostida 10 m/s tezlik bilan otilgan jism 8 m naridagi vertikal devorga mutloq elastik urilib qaytdi va yerga tushdi. Jism otilish nuqtasidan qanday masofada tushadi (m)?
output:
Jismning parabolik harakati uchun quyidagi tenglamalardan foydalanamiz:
- \( v_{0x} = v_0 \cos(\alpha) \) - gorizontal tezlik,
- \( v_{0y} = v_0 \sin(\alpha) \) - vertikal tezlik,
- \( t =  rac{2v_{0y}}{g} \) - jism havoda bo'lgan vaqt,
- \( s = v_{0x} \cdot t \) - jismning gorizontal yo'nalishdagi masofasi.
Berilgan ma'lumotlardan foydalanib, boshlang'ich tezlikning gorizontal va vertikal komponentlarini hisoblaymiz:
- \( v_{0x} = 10 \cos(45^{\circ}) = 10 \cdot  rac{\sqrt{2}}{2} = 5\sqrt{2} \, 	ext{m/s} \),
- \( v_{0y} = 10 \sin(45^{\circ}) = 10 \cdot  rac{\sqrt{2}}{2} = 5\sqrt{2} \, 	ext{m/s} \).
Jism havoda bo'lgan vaqtni hisoblaymiz:
\[ t =  rac{2v_{0y}}{g} =  rac{2 \cdot 5\sqrt{2}}{10} = \sqrt{2} \, 	ext{s} \]
Endi, jismning gorizontal yo'nalishdagi masofasini hisoblaymiz:
\[ s = v_{0x} \cdot t = 5\sqrt{2} \cdot \sqrt{2} = 10 \, 	ext{m} \]
Jism 8 m naridagi devorga urilganidan, u devordan qaytganidan keyin qolgan masofa:
\[ s_{qolgan} = s - 8 = 10 - 8 = 2 \, 	ext{m} \]

question: Quvvati 27 MW bo‘lgan dvigatel samolyotga 100 m/s tezlik bera oladi. Quvvati 125 MW bo‘lgan dvigatel bu samolyotga qanday maksimal tezlik bera oladi(m/s)? Qarshilik kuchi tezlik kvadratiga proporsional.
output:
Quvvat \( P \) tezlik \( v \) va kuch \( F \) orqali ifodalanadi: \[P = F \cdot v\]
Kuch \( F \) qarshilik kuchiga teng, u tezlik kvadratiga proporsional: \[F = kv^2\]
Quvvat uchun ifodani qayta yozamiz: \[P = kv^3\]
Birinchi dvigatel uchun: \[27000 = k \cdot 100^3\]
Ikkinchi dvigatel uchun: \[125000 = k \cdot v^3\]
Ikkinchi tenglamani birinchi tenglama bilan bo‘lgan nisbatiga ko‘ra yozamiz: \[ rac{125000}{27000} =  rac{k \cdot v^3}{k \cdot 100^3}\]
\( k \) tenglama kanoniga kiradi, shuning uchun: \[ rac{125000}{27000} =  rac{v^3}{100^3}\]
Tezlikni topamiz: \[v = 100 \cdot \sqrt[3]{ rac{125000}{27000}} = 100 \cdot \sqrt[3]{4,6296} \approx 166,6 \, 	ext{m/s}\] Demak, javob A.

question: Suv solingan idish gorizontal yo‘nalishda  \sqrt{21} m/s^2  tezlanish bilan harakatlanmoqda. Idishning tubiga ip bog‘langan, ipning ikkinchi uchiga massasi 2 kg va suvga to‘liq botib turgan sharcha bog‘langan. Agar sharcha yasalgan moddaning zichligi 200 kg/m^3 bo‘lsa, shar turg‘un holatga kelgan vaqtdan keyin ipning taranglik kuchini hisoblang (N)? g =10 m/s^2
output:
Sharcha suvga botganligi sababli, unga Arximed kuchi ta'sir qiladi. Arximed kuchining kattaligi sharcha egallagan suv hajmining og'irligiga teng. Sharcha hajmi \( V =  rac{m}{\rho} \), sharcha zichligi \( \rho = 200 \, 	ext{kg/m}^3 \), sharcha massasi \( m = 2 \, 	ext{kg} \). Sharcha hajmi: \[V =  rac{2}{200} = 0.01 \, 	ext{m}^3\]
Arximed kuchi: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = \rho_{	ext{su}} \cdot V \cdot g = 1000 \cdot 0.01 \cdot 10 = 100 \, 	ext{N}\]
Sharcha turg‘un holatga kelganda, unga ta’sir qiluvchi kuchlar muvozanatga keladi. Sharchaga ta’sir qiluvchi kuchlar: ipning taranglik kuchi \( T \), Arximed kuchi \( F_{	ext{Arx}} \) va sharchaning og‘irligi \( F_g = mg \). Sharcha turg‘un holatda bo‘lgani uchun, kuchlarning proyeksiyasi quyidagicha:
- Vertikal yo‘nalishda: \( T - F_{	ext{Arx}} - F_g = 0 \)
- Gorizontal yo‘nalishda: \( m \cdot a = 0 \), chunki sharcha gorizontal yo‘nalishda turg‘un holatda.
Vertikal yo‘nalishdagi kuchlarni hisobga olgan holda, ipning taranglik kuchini topamiz: \[T = F_{	ext{Arx}} + F_g = 100 \, 	ext{N} + 2 \cdot 10 \, 	ext{N} = 100 \, 	ext{N} + 20 \, 	ext{N} = 120 \, 	ext{N}\]
Lekin, sharcha gorizontal yo‘nalishda tezlanayotganligi sababli, uning og‘irligi va Arximed kuchining ta’siri ostida, sharcha ipga nisbatan burchak ostida osilib turadi. Buning uchun, ipning taranglik kuchini quyidagi formula bilan hisoblaymiz: \[T =  rac{F_g}{\cos{\alpha}}\]
Burchak \( \alpha \) ni topish uchun, gorizontal tezlanishdan foydalanamiz: \[a = g \cdot \tan{\alpha}\]
\[\tan{\alpha} =  rac{a}{g} =  rac{\sqrt{21}}{10}\]
\[\alpha = \arctan{ rac{\sqrt{21}}{10}}\]
\[\cos{\alpha} = \cos{(\arctan{ rac{\sqrt{21}}{10}})} =  rac{1}{\sqrt{1 + ( rac{\sqrt{21}}{10})^2}} =  rac{10}{\sqrt{100 + 21}} =  rac{10}{\sqrt{121}} =  rac{10}{11}\]
Endi, ipning taranglik kuchini hisoblaymiz: \[T =  rac{F_g}{\cos{\alpha}} =  rac{2 \cdot 10}{ rac{10}{11}} = 2 \cdot 11 = 22 \, 	ext{N}\] Demak, javob A.

Uchish va tushishning umumiy vaqti \( t = 6 \, 	ext{s} \), va u uchish vaqtining 3 soniyasida maksimal balandlikka yetadi. Vertikal harakat uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi:
   \[v_0 = g 	imes t = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes 3 \, 	ext{s} = 30 \, 	ext{m/s}.\]  Demak, javob C) 30.Savol: Moddiy nuqta 90 sm radiusli aylana bo‘ylab tekis harakatlanmoqda. Agar u 9 s da 90° ga burilgan bo‘lsa, uning burchak tezligi qancha (rad/s)?
A) 10
B) 45
C) π/18
D) 0,56
Yechim: Aylananing to‘liq burilish burchagi \( 2\pi \) radian. Moddiy nuqta 90° (yoki \(  rac{\pi}{2} \) radian) burilgan. Burchak tezligini hisoblash uchun, burchakni vaqtga bo‘lish kerak: 
\[\omega =  rac{\Delta 	heta}{\Delta t} =  rac{ rac{\pi}{2}}{9 \, 	ext{s}} =  rac{\pi}{18} \, 	ext{rad/s}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: Dastlab tinch turgan 2 kg massali jism 3 N doimiy kuch ta’sirida tezlashmoqda. 6,5 minut vaqt davomida kuch bajargan ishni (kJ) hisoblang.
A) 98
B) 245
C) 342
D) 164
Yechim: Ishni hisoblash uchun quyidagi formula ishlatiladi: \[A = F 	imes d\]. Bu yerda \( F = 3 \, 	ext{N} \) (kuch), \( d \) esa harakat masofasi.
Jismning tezlanishini hisoblash uchun \( F = ma \) formulasidan foydalanamiz: \[a =  rac{F}{m} =  rac{3 \, 	ext{N}}{2 \, 	ext{kg}} = 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2.\]
Jismning harakatlangan masofasini hisoblash uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi: \[d =  rac{1}{2} a t^2 \]. Bu yerda \( t = 6.5 \, 	ext{min} = 390 \, 	ext{s} \).
\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]
Endi ishni hisoblaymiz: \[A = 3 \, 	ext{N} 	imes 114075 \, 	ext{m} = 342225 \, 	ext{J} = 342.225 \, 	ext{kJ}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: 2,7 kg massali muz boʻlagi ipga shunday osib qoʻyilganki, muzning chorak hajmi suvga botib turibdi. Ipdagi taranglik kuchini toping.
A) 19,5 N
B) 24 N
C) 18 N
D) 14,4 N
Yechim: Gravitatsion kuch: \[F_{	ext{grav}} = m \cdot g = 2,7 \cdot 10 = 27 \, 	ext{N}\]
Arximed kuchi: Muzning botgan hajmi \(  rac{V}{4} \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 1000 \cdot  rac{V}{4} \cdot 10 = 2500 \cdot V\]
Muzning hajmi \( V =  rac{2,7}{900} = 0,003 \, 	ext{m}^3 \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 2500 \cdot 0,003 = 7,5 \, 	ext{N}\]
Taranglik kuchi:\[T = F_{	ext{grav}} - F_{	ext{Arx}} = 27 - 7,5 = 19,5 \, 	ext{N}\] Demak, javob ASavol: 8 m/s tezlik bilan to‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatlanayotgan chang‘ichi 25 s da qancha masofani bosib o‘tadi (m) ?
A) 50
B) 100
C) 150
D) 200
Yechim: To‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatda masofa quyidagi formula bilan hisoblanadi:
\[s = v \cdot t\]
  - \( v \) — tezlik (\( 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),
   - \( t \) — vaqt (\( 25 \, 	ext{s} \)).
Masofani hisoblash:\[s = 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \cdot 25 \, 	ext{s} = 200 \, 	ext{m}\] Demak, javob D.

question: 70 m chuqurlikdagi suv bosimi, 10 m chuqurlikdagi suv bosimidan necha marta katta? Atmosfera bosimi 100kPa. g=10 m/s^2
output:
Suv bosimini hisoblash uchun quyidagi formula ishlatiladi: 
\[P = P_0 + \rho g h\]
- \( P_0 \) — atmosfera bosimi (\( 100 \, 	ext{kPa} \)),
- \( \rho \) — suvning zichligi (\( 1000 \, 	ext{kg/m}^3 \)),
- \( g \) — erkin tushish tezlanishi (\( 10 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 \)),
- \( h \) — chuqurlik.

70 m chuqurlikdagi bosim:
\[P_{70} = 100 \, 	ext{kPa} + 1000 \, 	ext{kg/m}^3 \cdot 10 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 \cdot 70 \, 	ext{m} = 100 \, 	ext{kPa} + 700000 \, 	ext{Pa} = 100 \, 	ext{kPa} + 700 \, 	ext{kPa} = 800 \, 	ext{kPa}\]

10 m chuqurlikdagi bosim:
\[P_{10} = 100 \, 	ext{kPa} + 1000 \, 	ext{kg/m}^3 \cdot 10 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 \cdot 10 \, 	ext{m} = 100 \, 	ext{kPa} + 100000 \, 	ext{Pa} = 100 \, 	ext{kPa} + 100 \, 	ext{kPa} = 200 \, 	ext{kPa}\]

70 m chuqurlikdagi bosim 10 m chuqurlikdagiga nisbatan necha marta katta:
\[\frac{P_{70}}{P_{10}} = \frac{800 \, 	ext{kPa}}{200 \, 	ext{kPa}} = 4\] Demak, javob D.

question: 5 kg massali jism yer sirtidan 15 m balandlikdan 4 m/s tezlik bilan otildi. Jismning yerga urilish paytidagi kinetik energiyasi nimaga teng bo‘ladi (J)? g=10 m/s^2.
output:
Jismning dastlabki kinetik energiyasi: 
\[K_1 = \frac{1}{2}mv_1^2 = \frac{1}{2} \cdot 5 \, \text{kg} \cdot (4 \, \text{m/s})^2 = \frac{1}{2} \cdot 5 \cdot 16 = 40 \, \text{J}\]
Jismning dastlabki potensial energiyasi: 
\[U_1 = mgh_1 = 5 \, \text{kg} \cdot 10 \, \text{m/s}^2 \cdot 15 \, \text{m} = 750 \, \text{J}\]
Jismning oxirgi potensial energiyasi (yerga tegilganda): 
\[U_2 = mgh_2 = 5 \, \text{kg} \cdot 10 \, \text{m/s}^2 \cdot 0 = 0 \, \text{J}\]
Energiya saqlanish qonuniga asosan, jismning boshlang‘ichdagi umumiy energiyasi oxirgi umumiy energiyasi bilan teng:
\[K_1 + U_1 = K_2 + U_2\]
\[40 \, \text{J} + 750 \, \text{J} = K_2 + 0\]
\[K_2 = 790 \, \text{J}\]
Demak, javob B.

\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]

A) 19,5 N
B) 24 N
C) 18 N
D) 14,4 N
Yechim: Gravitatsion kuch: \[F_{	ext{grav}} = m \cdot g = 2,7 \cdot 10 = 27 \, 	ext{N}\]

A) 20

D) 40

B) 45
C) π/18
D) 0,56

\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]

\[s = v \cdot t\]

question: Gidravlik presning kichik porsheniga 500 N kuch ta’sir etib u 15 sm masofaga tushdi, katta porshen 5 sm ga ko‘tarilgan bo‘lsa, unga qanday kuch ta’sir etadi (kN)?
output:
Kichik porshenning siljishi \( \Delta h_1 = 15 \, 	ext{cm} = 0.15 \, 	ext{m} \), katta porshenning siljishi \( \Delta h_2 = 5 \, 	ext{cm} = 0.05 \, 	ext{m} \). 
Gidravlik pressda kuchlar nisbati porshenlarning maydonlari nisbatiga teng. Maydonlar nisbati siljishlar nisbatiga teng, chunki porshenlarning radiuslari \( r \) bilan belgilanadi va maydon \( S = \pi r^2 \) formula bilan hisoblanadi.
Kuchlar nisbati quyidagicha:
\[  rac{F_1}{F_2} =  rac{\Delta h_2}{\Delta h_1} \]
Kichik porshenga ta’sir etuvchi kuch \( F_1 = 500 \, 	ext{N} \) berilgan. Katta porshenga ta’sir etuvchi kuch \( F_2 \) ni topish uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi:
\[ F_2 = F_1 	imes  rac{\Delta h_1}{\Delta h_2} = 500 \, 	ext{N} 	imes  rac{0.15 \, 	ext{m}}{0.05 \, 	ext{m}} = 500 \, 	ext{N} 	imes 3 = 1500 \, 	ext{N} = 1.5 \, 	ext{kN} \]
Demak, javob D.

question: Chana gorizont bilan 45° burchak hosil qilgan tepalikdan pastga tomon 100 m masofani bosib tushdi. Chananing vertikal va gorizontal yo‘nalishlardagi ko‘chishini toping (m).
output:
Chana tepalikdan pastga tushgani uchun, u uchburchakning ikkita katetini tashkil qiluvchi vertikal va gorizontal yo‘nalishlardagi harakatni amalga oshiradi. Burchak 45°, shuning uchun bu teng yonli uchburchakdir. Shunday qilib, vertikal va gorizontal yo‘nalishlardagi ko‘chishlar teng bo‘ladi.
Tepalikning uzunligi 100 m, shuning uchun har bir katet (vertikal va gorizontal) uzunligi:
\[100 \, 	ext{m} \cdot \sin(45^\circ) = 100 \, 	ext{m} \cdot \cos(45^\circ) = 100 \, 	ext{m} \cdot 0.707 = 70.7 \, 	ext{m}\]
Demak, chana vertikal va gorizontal yo‘nalishda taxminan 70,7 m harakat qiladi. Yaqinlashgan variant sifatida 71 m ni tanlaymiz.
Javob A) 71;71

A) 20
B) 35
C) 30
D) 40
Yechim: Jismning vertikal yo‘nalishdagi harakati uchun, uchish va tushish vaqtlarining yig‘indisi 6 soniya, ya'ni 3 soniya uchish va 3 soniya tushish bo‘ladi (har bir yo‘nalishda teng vaqt).
Tushish va uchish vaqtining 3 sekundini hisobga olgan holda, erkin tushish tezligi \( g = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 \) yordamida hisoblanadi.
Uchish va tushishning umumiy vaqti \( t = 6 \, 	ext{s} \), va u uchish vaqtining 3 soniyasida maksimal balandlikka yetadi. Vertikal harakat uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi:
   \[v_0 = g 	imes t = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes 3 \, 	ext{s} = 30 \, 	ext{m/s}.\]  Demak, javob C) 30.Savol: Moddiy nuqta 90 sm radiusli aylana bo‘ylab tekis harakatlanmoqda. Agar u 9 s da 90° ga burilgan bo‘lsa, uning burchak tezligi qancha (rad/s)?
A) 10
B) 45
C) π/18
D) 0,56
Yechim: Aylananing to‘liq burilish burchagi \( 2\pi \) radian. Moddiy nuqta 90° (yoki \(  rac{\pi}{2} \) radian) burilgan. Burchak tezligini hisoblash uchun, burchakni vaqtga bo‘lish kerak: 
\[\omega =  rac{\Delta 	heta}{\Delta t} =  rac{ rac{\pi}{2}}{9 \, 	ext{s}} =  rac{\pi}{18} \, 	ext{rad/s}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: Dastlab tinch turgan 2 kg massali jism 3 N doimiy kuch ta’sirida tezlashmoqda. 6,5 minut vaqt davomida kuch bajargan ishni (kJ) hisoblang.
A) 98
B) 245
C) 342
D) 164
Yechim: Ishni hisoblash uchun quyidagi formula ishlatiladi: \[A = F 	imes d\]. Bu yerda \( F = 3 \, 	ext{N} \) (kuch), \( d \) esa harakat masofasi.
Jismning tezlanishini hisoblash uchun \( F = ma \) formulasidan foydalanamiz: \[a =  rac{F}{m} =  rac{3 \, 	ext{N}}{2 \, 	ext{kg}} = 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2.\]
Jismning harakatlangan masofasini hisoblash uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi: \[d =  rac{1}{2} a t^2 \]. Bu yerda \( t = 6.5 \, 	ext{min} = 390 \, 	ext{s} \).
\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]
Endi ishni hisoblaymiz: \[A = 3 \, 	ext{N} 	imes 114075 \, 	ext{m} = 342225 \, 	ext{J} = 342.225 \, 	ext{kJ}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: 2,7 kg massali muz boʻlagi ipga shunday osib qoʻyilganki, muzning chorak hajmi suvga botib turibdi. Ipdagi taranglik kuchini toping.
A) 19,5 N
B) 24 N
C) 18 N
D) 14,4 N
Yechim: Gravitatsion kuch: \[F_{	ext{grav}} = m \cdot g = 2,7 \cdot 10 = 27 \, 	ext{N}\]
Arximed kuchi: Muzning botgan hajmi \(  rac{V}{4} \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 1000 \cdot  rac{V}{4} \cdot 10 = 2500 \cdot V\]
Muzning hajmi \( V =  rac{2,7}{900} = 0,003 \, 	ext{m}^3 \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 2500 \cdot 0,003 = 7,5 \, 	ext{N}\]
Taranglik kuchi:\[T = F_{	ext{grav}} - F_{	ext{Arx}} = 27 - 7,5 = 19,5 \, 	ext{N}\] Demak, javob ASavol: 8 m/s tezlik bilan to‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatlanayotgan chang‘ichi 25 s da qancha masofani bosib o‘tadi (m) ?
A) 50
B) 100
C) 150
D) 200
Yechim: To‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatda masofa quyidagi formula bilan hisoblanadi:
\[s = v \cdot t\]
  - \( v \) — tezlik (\( 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),
   - \( t \) — vaqt (\( 25 \, 	ext{s} \)).
Masofani hisoblash:\[s = 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \cdot 25 \, 	ext{s} = 200 \, 	ext{m}\] Demak, javob D.
question: Ikki jism bir-biriga nisbatan 60° burchak ostida 10m/s va 20 m/s tezliklar bilan harakatlanmoqda. 1- jismning 2- jismga nisbatan tezligi qanday (m/s)?
output:
Jismlar bir-biriga nisbatan harakatlanayotganligi sababli, ularning tezliklarini vektor hisobida qo'shib, ularning nisbiy tezligini topish mumkin. 

Nisbiy tezlikni topish uchun quyidagi formula ishlatiladi:
\[v_{12} = \sqrt{v_1^2 + v_2^2 - 2v_1v_2\cos(\alpha)}\]
- \( v_{12} \) — 1-jismning 2-jismga nisbatan tezligi,
- \( v_1 \) — 1-jismning tezligi (\( 10 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),
- \( v_2 \) — 2-jismning tezligi (\( 20 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),
- \( \alpha \) — jismlar harakatlanayotgan burchak (\( 60^\circ \)).

Nisbiy tezlikni hisoblash:
\[v_{12} = \sqrt{10^2 + 20^2 - 2 \cdot 10 \cdot 20 \cdot \cos(60^\circ)}\]
\[v_{12} = \sqrt{100 + 400 - 400 \cdot 0.5}\]
\[v_{12} = \sqrt{500 - 200}\]
\[v_{12} = \sqrt{300}\]
\[v_{12} = 17.32 \, 	ext{m/s}\]
Demak, javob A.

question: Bola qayiqni daryo qirg‘og‘iga perpendikulyar yo‘nalishda haydamoqda, lekin suv oqimi uning yo‘nalishini shunday o‘zgartiryaptiki natijaviy tezlik 10 m/s vektori qirg‘oq bilan 60° burchakni hosil qildi. Suv oqimniig tezligi qanday bo‘lgan (m/s)?
output:
Bola qayiqni daryo qirg‘og‘iga perpendikulyar yo‘nalishda haydayotganligi ma’lum. Suv oqimi uning yo‘nalishini o‘zgartirib, natijaviy tezlik vektori qirg‘oqqa nisbatan 60° burchak hosil qiladi. Bola qayiqni haydovchi kuchning tezligi \( v_1 \), suv oqimining tezligi \( v_2 \) va natijaviy tezlik \( v \) (10 m/s) deb belgilaymiz.
Suv oqimining tezligini topish uchun quyidagi geometrik munosabatdan foydalanamiz:
\[ \frac{v_2}{v_1} = \frac{\sin(60^\circ)}{\sin(30^\circ)} \]
\[ \frac{v_2}{v_1} = \frac{\sqrt{3}/2}{1/2} = \sqrt{3} \]
\[ v_2 = v_1 \cdot \sqrt{3} \]
Bola qayiqni haydovchi kuchning tezligi \( v_1 \) ni topish uchun quyidagi geometrik munosabatdan foydalanamiz:
\[ v_1 = v \cdot \cos(60^\circ) \]
\[ v_1 = 10 \, 	ext{m/s} \cdot \frac{1}{2} = 5 \, 	ext{m/s} \]
Endi suv oqimining tezligini hisoblaymiz:
\[ v_2 = 5 \, 	ext{m/s} \cdot \sqrt{3} \approx 8.66 \, 	ext{m/s} \]
Lekin, berilgan variantlardan hech biri 8.66 ga teng emas. Buning sababi, suv oqimining tezligi bola qayiqni haydovchi kuchning tezligidan aniq \(\sqrt{3}\) marta katta ekanligi haqidagi taxmin noto‘g‘ri bo‘lishi mumkin.
To‘g‘ri yondashuv:
1. Bola qayiqni haydovchi kuchning tezligi \( v_1 \) ni topish:
\[ v_1 = v \cdot \cos(60^\circ) \]
\[ v_1 = 10 \, 	ext{m/s} \cdot \frac{1}{2} = 5 \, 	ext{m/s} \]
2. Suv oqimining tezligi \( v_2 \) ni topish:
\[ v_2 = v \cdot \sin(60^\circ) \]
\[ v_2 = 10 \, 	ext{m/s} \cdot \frac{\sqrt{3}}{2} \approx 8.66 \, 	ext{m/s} \]
Lekin, bu yerda xato bor, chunki suv oqimining tezligi \( v_2 \) bola qayiqni haydovchi kuchning tezligi \( v_1 \) ga qo‘shiladi. Tegishli tezliklarni qo‘shish uchun vektor qo‘shish qoidalaridan foydalanamiz:
\[ v^2 = v_1^2 + v_2^2 \]
\[ 10^2 = 5^2 + v_2^2 \]
\[ 100 = 25 + v_2^2 \]
\[ v_2^2 = 100 - 25 \]
\[ v_2^2 = 75 \]
\[ v_2 = \sqrt{75} \approx 8.66 \, 	ext{m/s} \]
Demak, suv oqimining tezligi taxminan 8.66 m/s. Biroq, berilgan variantlar orasida 8.66 m/s ga teng bo‘lgan variant yo‘q. Eng yaqin variant 8.66 m/s dan biroz kam — 7.1 m/s.
Shunday ekan, to‘g‘ri javob D) 7.1 m/s hisoblanadi.

Yechim: Jismning vertikal yo‘nalishdagi harakati uchun, uchish va tushish vaqtlarining yig‘indisi 6 soniya, ya'ni 3 soniya uchish va 3 soniya tushish bo‘ladi (har bir yo‘nalishda teng vaqt).
Tushish va uchish vaqtining 3 sekundini hisobga olgan holda, erkin tushish tezligi \( g = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 \) yordamida hisoblanadi.
Uchish va tushishning umumiy vaqti \( t = 6 \, 	ext{s} \), va u uchish vaqtining 3 soniyasida maksimal balandlikka yetadi. Vertikal harakat uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi:
   \[v_0 = g 	imes t = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes 3 \, 	ext{s} = 30 \, 	ext{m/s}.\]  Demak, javob C) 30.Savol: Moddiy nuqta 90 sm radiusli aylana bo‘ylab tekis harakatlanmoqda. Agar u 9 s da 90° ga burilgan bo‘lsa, uning burchak tezligi qancha (rad/s)?
A) 10
B) 45
C) π/18
D) 0,56
Yechim: Aylananing to‘liq burilish burchagi \( 2\pi \) radian. Moddiy nuqta 90° (yoki \(  rac{\pi}{2} \) radian) burilgan. Burchak tezligini hisoblash uchun, burchakni vaqtga bo‘lish kerak: 
\[\omega =  rac{\Delta 	heta}{\Delta t} =  rac{ rac{\pi}{2}}{9 \, 	ext{s}} =  rac{\pi}{18} \, 	ext{rad/s}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: Dastlab tinch turgan 2 kg massali jism 3 N doimiy kuch ta’sirida tezlashmoqda. 6,5 minut vaqt davomida kuch bajargan ishni (kJ) hisoblang.
A) 98
B) 245
C) 342
D) 164
Yechim: Ishni hisoblash uchun quyidagi formula ishlatiladi: \[A = F 	imes d\]. Bu yerda \( F = 3 \, 	ext{N} \) (kuch), \( d \) esa harakat masofasi.
Jismning tezlanishini hisoblash uchun \( F = ma \) formulasidan foydalanamiz: \[a =  rac{F}{m} =  rac{3 \, 	ext{N}}{2 \, 	ext{kg}} = 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2.\]
Jismning harakatlangan masofasini hisoblash uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi: \[d =  rac{1}{2} a t^2 \]. Bu yerda \( t = 6.5 \, 	ext{min} = 390 \, 	ext{s} \).
\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]
Endi ishni hisoblaymiz: \[A = 3 \, 	ext{N} 	imes 114075 \, 	ext{m} = 342225 \, 	ext{J} = 342.225 \, 	ext{kJ}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: 2,7 kg massali muz boʻlagi ipga shunday osib qoʻyilganki, muzning chorak hajmi suvga botib turibdi. Ipdagi taranglik kuchini toping.
A) 19,5 N
B) 24 N
C) 18 N
D) 14,4 N
Yechim: Gravitatsion kuch: \[F_{	ext{grav}} = m \cdot g = 2,7 \cdot 10 = 27 \, 	ext{N}\]
Arximed kuchi: Muzning botgan hajmi \(  rac{V}{4} \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 1000 \cdot  rac{V}{4} \cdot 10 = 2500 \cdot V\]
Muzning hajmi \( V =  rac{2,7}{900} = 0,003 \, 	ext{m}^3 \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 2500 \cdot 0,003 = 7,5 \, 	ext{N}\]
Taranglik kuchi:\[T = F_{	ext{grav}} - F_{	ext{Arx}} = 27 - 7,5 = 19,5 \, 	ext{N}\] Demak, javob ASavol: 8 m/s tezlik bilan to‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatlanayotgan chang‘ichi 25 s da qancha masofani bosib o‘tadi (m) ?
A) 50
B) 100
C) 150
D) 200
Yechim: To‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatda masofa quyidagi formula bilan hisoblanadi:
\[s = v \cdot t\]
  - \( v \) — tezlik (\( 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),
   - \( t \) — vaqt (\( 25 \, 	ext{s} \)).
Masofani hisoblash:\[s = 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \cdot 25 \, 	ext{s} = 200 \, 	ext{m}\] Demak, javob D.
question: Metrodagi eskalatorda odam va eskalator birgalikda harakat qilsa 15 s da ko‘tariladi. Eskalator tinch tursa odam 30 s da ko‘tariladi. Eskalator harakatsiz odamni necha s da olib chiqadi?
output:
Odamning tezligi \( v_1 \), eskalatorning tezligi \( v_2 \) bo‘lsin. Birgalikda harakat qilganda ularning tezligi \( v_1 + v_2 \) bo‘ladi.
Odam va eskalator birgalikda harakat qilganda, ular 15 sekundada ko‘tariladi. Odam alohida harakat qilganda, u 30 sekundada ko‘tariladi. Eskalator harakatsiz odamni ko‘tarish vaqti \( t_2 \) bo‘lsin.
Odamning alohida tezligi uchun: \[v_1 =  rac{h}{30}\]
Odam va eskalatorning birgalikdagi tezligi uchun: \[v_1 + v_2 =  rac{h}{15}\]
Eskalatorning tezligi uchun: \[v_2 =  rac{h}{t_2}\]
Odamning alohida tezligi va odam bilan birgalikda harakatlanayotgan eskalatorning tezligi orasidagi munosabatdan foydalanib, quyidagi tenglama olinadi: \[v_1 + v_2 = 2v_1\]
\[v_2 = v_1\]
Eskalatorning alohida tezligi odamning alohida tezligiga teng. Demak, eskalator ham 30 sekundada odamni ko‘taradi.
Javob D) 30

question: Richagning 5 m li yelkasiga 26 N kuch ta’sir etmoqda. Ikkinchi yelkasiga 65 N kuch qo‘yilganda richag muvozanatda qolishi uchun bu yelkaning uzunligi qancha (m) bo‘lishi kerak?
output:
Richag muvozanatda bo‘lishi uchun, aylanish momentlari teng bo‘lishi kerak. Birinchi yelka uchun aylanish momenti:
\[M_1 = F_1 \cdot l_1 = 26 \, 	ext{N} \cdot 5 \, 	ext{m} = 130 \, 	ext{Nm}\]
Ikkinchi yelka uchun aylanish momenti:
\[M_2 = F_2 \cdot l_2 = 65 \, 	ext{N} \cdot l_2\]
Aylanish momentlarini tenglashtirish:
\[130 \, 	ext{Nm} = 65 \, 	ext{N} \cdot l_2\]
\[l_2 =  rac{130}{65} = 2 \, 	ext{m}\]
Demak, javob D.

A) 19,5 N

C) 18 N
D) 14,4 N
Yechim: Gravitatsion kuch: \[F_{	ext{grav}} = m \cdot g = 2,7 \cdot 10 = 27 \, 	ext{N}\]
Arximed kuchi: Muzning botgan hajmi \(  rac{V}{4} \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 1000 \cdot  rac{V}{4} \cdot 10 = 2500 \cdot V\]
Muzning hajmi \( V =  rac{2,7}{900} = 0,003 \, 	ext{m}^3 \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 2500 \cdot 0,003 = 7,5 \, 	ext{N}\]
Taranglik kuchi:\[T = F_{	ext{grav}} - F_{	ext{Arx}} = 27 - 7,5 = 19,5 \, 	ext{N}\] Demak, javob ASavol: 8 m/s tezlik bilan to‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatlanayotgan chang‘ichi 25 s da qancha masofani bosib o‘tadi (m) ?

question: Qiyalik burchagi 30^o bo‘lgan qiya tekislikga unga parallel bo‘lgan 40 N kuch yordamida 5 kg massali jism 1 m/s^2 tezlanish bilan tortib chiqarilmoqda. Qiya tekislik va jism orasidagi ishqalanish koeffitsiyentini aniqlang. g=10 m/s^2.
output:
Jismga ta'sir etuvchi kuchlarni tahlil qilaylik:

1. Tortish kuchi (F): 40 N, qiya tekislikka parallel.
2. Gravitatsion kuch (mg): 5 kg * 10 m/s^2 = 50 N, vertikal pastga.
3. Normal kuch (N): qiya tekislikka perpendikulyar, jismni qiya tekislikda ushlab turadi.
4. Ishqalanish kuchi (f): jismni tortishga qarshi ishlaydi, qiya tekislikka parallel.

Jism 1 m/s^2 tezlanish bilan harakatlanayotganligi sababli, Newtonning ikkinchi qonunidan foydalanamiz:

F - f = ma

Bu yerda:
- F = 40 N (tortish kuchi)
- f = ishqalanish kuchi (aniqlanishi kerak)
- m = 5 kg (jismning massasi)
- a = 1 m/s^2 (tezlanish)

Ishqalanish kuchini topish uchun, biz normal kuchni (N) hisoblashimiz kerak. Normal kuch jismni qiya tekislikda ushlab turadi va gravitatsion kuchning vertikal komponentiga teng va qarama-qarshi:

N = mg * cos(30°)

N = 50 N * cos(30°)
= 50 N * 0,866
= 43,3 N

Endi, ishqalanish koeffitsiyentini (μ) topish uchun, biz quyidagi formula bilan foydalanamiz:

f = μ * N

F - f = ma ga qaytib kelib, f ni ifodalaymiz:

40 N - f = 5 kg * 1 m/s^2
40 N - f = 5 N

f = 40 N - 5 N
= 35 N

Endi, μ ni topish uchun:

f = μ * N
35 N = μ * 43,3 N

μ = 35 N / 43,3 N
= 0,808

Biroq, bu yerda xato bor, chunki ishqalanish koeffitsiyenti 1 dan katta bo'lishi mumkin emas. Xato tushuntirish uchun, biz boshqa usul bilan ishqalanish koeffitsiyentini hisoblaymiz.

Jism 30° burchak ostida joylashgan qiya tekislik bo'ylab harakatlanayotganligi sababli, gravitatsion kuchning komponenti jismni pastga tortadi va ishqalanish kuchiga qo'shiladi. Bu komponent:

mg * sin(30°) = 50 N * 0,5 = 25 N

Tortish kuchi (F) jismni yuqoriga tortadi, ishqalanish kuchi (f) va gravitatsion kuchning komponenti (25 N) jismni pastga tortadi. Jism 1 m/s^2 tezlanish bilan harakatlanayotganligi sababli, biz quyidagi tenglamani yozamiz:

F - f - 25 N = ma
40 N - f - 25 N = 5 kg * 1 m/s^2
15 N - f = 5 N

f = 15 N - 5 N
= 10 N

Endi, ishqalanish koeffitsiyentini (μ) topish uchun:

f = μ * N
10 N = μ * 43,3 N

μ = 10 N / 43,3 N
= 0,231

Demak, ishqalanish koeffitsiyenti taxminan 0,23 ga teng.

Javob: B) 0,23
system:
Savol: Jism qanday tezlik bilan vertikal otilsa, u 6 s dan so‘ng otilgan joyiga qaytib tushadi (m/s)?
A) 20
B) 35
C) 30
D) 40
Yechim: Jismning vertikal yo‘nalishdagi harakati uchun, uchish va tushish vaqtlarining yig‘indisi 6 soniya, ya'ni 3 soniya uchish va 3 soniya tushish bo‘ladi (har bir yo‘nalishda teng vaqt).
Tushish va uchish vaqtining 3 sekundini hisobga olgan holda, erkin tushish tezligi \( g = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 \) yordamida hisoblanadi.
Uchish va tushishning umumiy vaqti \( t = 6 \, 	ext{s} \), va u uchish vaqtining 3 soniyasida maksimal balandlikka yetadi. Vertikal harakat uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi:
   \[v_0 = g 	imes t = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes 3 \, 	ext{s} = 30 \, 	ext{m/s}.\]  Demak, javob C) 30.Savol: Moddiy nuqta 90 sm radiusli aylana bo‘ylab tekis harakatlanmoqda. Agar u 9 s da 90° ga burilgan bo‘lsa, uning burchak tezligi qancha (rad/s)?
A) 10
B) 45
C) π/18
D) 0,56

\[\omega =  rac{\Delta 	heta}{\Delta t} =  rac{ rac{\pi}{2}}{9 \, 	ext{s}} =  rac{\pi}{18} \, 	ext{rad/s}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: Dastlab tinch turgan 2 kg massali jism 3 N doimiy kuch ta’sirida tezlashmoqda. 6,5 minut vaqt davomida kuch bajargan ishni (kJ) hisoblang.
A) 98
B) 245
C) 342
D) 164

Jismning tezlanishini hisoblash uchun \( F = ma \) formulasidan foydalanamiz: \[a =  rac{F}{m} =  rac{3 \, 	ext{N}}{2 \, 	ext{kg}} = 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2.\]
Jismning harakatlangan masofasini hisoblash uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi: \[d =  rac{1}{2} a t^2 \]. Bu yerda \( t = 6.5 \, 	ext{min} = 390 \, 	ext{s} \).
\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]
Endi ishni hisoblaymiz: \[A = 3 \, 	ext{N} 	imes 114075 \, 	ext{m} = 342225 \, 	ext{J} = 342.225 \, 	ext{kJ}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: 2,7 kg massali muz boʻlagi ipga shunday osib qoʻyilganki, muzning chorak hajmi suvga botib turibdi. Ipdagi taranglik kuchini toping.
A) 19,5 N
B) 24 N
C) 18 N
D) 14,4 N
Yechim: Gravitatsion kuch: \[F_{	ext{grav}} = m \cdot g = 2,7 \cdot 10 = 27 \, 	ext{N}\]
Arximed kuchi: Muzning botgan hajmi \(  rac{V}{4} \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 1000 \cdot  rac{V}{4} \cdot 10 = 2500 \cdot V\]
Muzning hajmi \( V =  rac{2,7}{900} = 0,003 \, 	ext{m}^3 \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 2500 \cdot 0,003 = 7,5 \, 	ext{N}\]
Taranglik kuchi:\[T = F_{	ext{grav}} - F_{	ext{Arx}} = 27 - 7,5 = 19,5 \, 	ext{N}\] Demak, javob ASavol: 8 m/s tezlik bilan to‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatlanayotgan chang‘ichi 25 s da qancha masofani bosib o‘tadi (m) ?
A) 50
B) 100
C) 150
D) 200
Yechim: To‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatda masofa quyidagi formula bilan hisoblanadi:
\[s = v \cdot t\]
  - \( v \) — tezlik (\( 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),
   - \( t \) — vaqt (\( 25 \, 	ext{s} \)).
Masofani hisoblash:\[s = 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \cdot 25 \, 	ext{s} = 200 \, 	ext{m}\] Demak, javob D.

question: Suvli idish tubiga muz yopishgan (u butunlay suv ichida). Muz erib ketsa, suv sathi qanday o‘zgaradi?
output: Muzning zichligi suvdan kamroq, ya'ni 0,92 g/sm3. Muzning hajmi suvdan kattaroq, lekin og'irligi kamroq. Muzning og'irligi suvning og'irligiga teng bo'lgan hajmiga teng. Taranglik kuchi:\[T = F_{	ext{grav}} - F_{	ext{Arx}} = 27 - 7,5 = 19,5 \, 	ext{N}\] Demak, javob ASavol: 8 m/s tezlik bilan to‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatlanayotgan chang‘ichi 25 s da qancha masofani bosib o‘tadi (m) ?
A) 50
B) 100

D) 200
Yechim: To‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatda masofa quyidagi formula bilan hisoblanadi:

question: Rezinaning yo‘lga ishqalanish koeffitsiyenti 0,4 ga teng bo‘lsa, mototsiklchi gorizontal tekislikda 100 m radiusli yoy chizib, qanday maksimal tezlik bilan harakatlana oladi (km/h)?
output:
Markazga intiluvchi kuch: \[F_{centr} =  rac{m \cdot v^2}{R}\]
 Ishqalanish kuchi: \[F_{frict} = \mu \cdot F_N = \mu \cdot m \cdot g\]
Bu yerda \( \mu = 0.4 \), \( m \) — mototsikl massasi, \( v \) — mototsikl tezligi, \( R \) — aylananing radiusi, \( g \) — erkin tushish tezlanishi.
Agar mototsikl aylanada harakatlansa, markazga intiluvchi kuch ishqalanish kuchiga teng bo‘ladi: \[ rac{m \cdot v^2}{R} = \mu \cdot m \cdot g\]
Tezlikni hisoblash: \[v = \sqrt{\mu \cdot g \cdot R} = \sqrt{0.4 \cdot 10 \cdot 100} = \sqrt{400} = 20 \, 	ext{m/s} = 72 \, 	ext{km/h}\] Demak, javob B.

question: Aylana bo‘ylab tekis harakatlanayotgan jismning burchak tezligi π marta kamayib, aylana radiusi 10 marta ortsa, jismning markazga intilma tezlanishi qanday o‘zgaradi? π^2=10.
output:
Jismning dastlabki burchak tezligi \(\omega_1\), radiusi \(r_1\) bo'lsin. Jismning markazga intiluvchi tezlanishi \(a_1\) bo'lsin.
\[a_1 = \omega_1^2 \cdot r_1\]
Jismning burchak tezligi \(\pi\) marta kamayib, yangi burchak tezligi \(\omega_2 = \frac{\omega_1}{\pi}\) bo'lsin. Aylana radiusi 10 marta o'ralsa, yangi radius \(r_2 = 10r_1\) bo'lsin. Jismning yangi markazga intiluvchi tezlanishi \(a_2\) bo'lsin.
\[a_2 = \omega_2^2 \cdot r_2 = \left(\frac{\omega_1}{\pi}\right)^2 \cdot 10r_1\]
\[a_2 = \frac{\omega_1^2}{\pi^2} \cdot 10r_1\]
\(\pi^2 = 10\) ga asoslanib, \(a_2\) ni quyidagicha ifodalash mumkin:
\[a_2 = \frac{\omega_1^2}{10} \cdot 10r_1 = \omega_1^2 \cdot r_1\]
\[a_2 = a_1\]
Demak, jismning markazga intiluvchi tezlanishi o'zgarmaydi. Javob A) o'zgarmaydi.

question: x va y yo‘nalishda harakatlanayotgan 8 kg va 2 kg massali sharlarning tezliklari mos ravishda 2 m/s va 6 m/s ga teng bo‘lsa, absolyut noelastik to‘qnashuvdan keyin sharlarning tezligi necha m/s ga teng?
output:
Impulsning saqlanish qonunidan foydalanamiz:
\[m_1 \cdot v_1 + m_2 \cdot v_2 = (m_1 + m_2) \cdot v\]
  - \( m_1 = 8 \, 	ext{kg} \),
  - \( m_2 = 2 \, 	ext{kg} \),
  - \( v_1 = 2 \, 	ext{m/s} \),
  - \( v_2 = 6 \, 	ext{m/s} \),
  - \( v \) — to‘qnashuvdan keyingi umumiy tezlik.
Quyidagi tenglama yordamida \( v \) ni topamiz:
\[8 \cdot 2 + 2 \cdot 6 = (8 + 2) \cdot v\]
\[16 + 12 = 10 \cdot v\]
\[28 = 10 \cdot v\]
\[v =  rac{28}{10} = 2.8 \, 	ext{m/s}\]
Demak, javob variantlari ichida 2.8 m/s ga eng yaqin variant B) 2 m/s.

Tushish va uchish vaqtining 3 sekundini hisobga olgan holda, erkin tushish tezligi \( g = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 \) yordamida hisoblanadi.
Uchish va tushishning umumiy vaqti \( t = 6 \, 	ext{s} \), va u uchish vaqtining 3 soniyasida maksimal balandlikka yetadi. Vertikal harakat uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi:
   \[v_0 = g 	imes t = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes 3 \, 	ext{s} = 30 \, 	ext{m/s}.\]  Demak, javob C) 30.Savol: Moddiy nuqta 90 sm radiusli aylana bo‘ylab tekis harakatlanmoqda. Agar u 9 s da 90° ga burilgan bo‘lsa, uning burchak tezligi qancha (rad/s)?
A) 10
B) 45
C) π/18
D) 0,56
Yechim: Aylananing to‘liq burilish burchagi \( 2\pi \) radian. Moddiy nuqta 90° (yoki \(  rac{\pi}{2} \) radian) burilgan. Burchak tezligini hisoblash uchun, burchakni vaqtga bo‘lish kerak: 
\[\omega =  rac{\Delta 	heta}{\Delta t} =  rac{ rac{\pi}{2}}{9 \, 	ext{s}} =  rac{\pi}{18} \, 	ext{rad/s}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: Dastlab tinch turgan 2 kg massali jism 3 N doimiy kuch ta’sirida tezlashmoqda. 6,5 minut vaqt davomida kuch bajargan ishni (kJ) hisoblang.
A) 98
B) 245
C) 342
D) 164
Yechim: Ishni hisoblash uchun quyidagi formula ishlatiladi: \[A = F 	imes d\]. Bu yerda \( F = 3 \, 	ext{N} \) (kuch), \( d \) esa harakat masofasi.
Jismning tezlanishini hisoblash uchun \( F = ma \) formulasidan foydalanamiz: \[a =  rac{F}{m} =  rac{3 \, 	ext{N}}{2 \, 	ext{kg}} = 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2.\]
Jismning harakatlangan masofasini hisoblash uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi: \[d =  rac{1}{2} a t^2 \]. Bu yerda \( t = 6.5 \, 	ext{min} = 390 \, 	ext{s} \).
\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]
Endi ishni hisoblaymiz: \[A = 3 \, 	ext{N} 	imes 114075 \, 	ext{m} = 342225 \, 	ext{J} = 342.225 \, 	ext{kJ}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: 2,7 kg massali muz boʻlagi ipga shunday osib qoʻyilganki, muzning chorak hajmi suvga botib turibdi. Ipdagi taranglik kuchini toping.
A) 19,5 N
B) 24 N
C) 18 N
D) 14,4 N
Yechim: Gravitatsion kuch: \[F_{	ext{grav}} = m \cdot g = 2,7 \cdot 10 = 27 \, 	ext{N}\]
Arximed kuchi: Muzning botgan hajmi \(  rac{V}{4} \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 1000 \cdot  rac{V}{4} \cdot 10 = 2500 \cdot V\]
Muzning hajmi \( V =  rac{2,7}{900} = 0,003 \, 	ext{m}^3 \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 2500 \cdot 0,003 = 7,5 \, 	ext{N}\]
Taranglik kuchi:\[T = F_{	ext{grav}} - F_{	ext{Arx}} = 27 - 7,5 = 19,5 \, 	ext{N}\] Demak, javob ASavol: 8 m/s tezlik bilan to‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatlanayotgan chang‘ichi 25 s da qancha masofani bosib o‘tadi (m) ?
A) 50
B) 100
C) 150
D) 200
Yechim: To‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatda masofa quyidagi formula bilan hisoblanadi:
\[s = v \cdot t\]
  - \( v \) — tezlik (\( 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),
   - \( t \) — vaqt (\( 25 \, 	ext{s} \)).
Masofani hisoblash:\[s = 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \cdot 25 \, 	ext{s} = 200 \, 	ext{m}\] Demak, javob D.

question: 125 m balandlikdan tosh erkin tashlab yuborildi. Qanday balandlikda toshning kinetik energiyasi toʻla mexanik energiyasining 20 % ini tashkil qiladi?
output:
Toshning dastlabki potensial energiyasi \( E_p = mgh \), bu yerda \( m \) - massasi, \( g \) - erkin tushish tezlanishi (\( 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 \)), \( h \) - boshlang‘ich balandligi (\( 125 \, 	ext{m} \)).
Toshning kinetik energiyasi \( E_k =  rac{1}{2}mv^2 \), bu yerda \( v \) - tezligi.
Toshning to‘liq mexanik energiyasi \( E_{	ext{total}} = E_p + E_k \).
Toshning kinetik energiyasi uning to‘liq mexanik energiyasining 20% ini tashkil qiladi, ya’ni \( E_k = 0.2E_{	ext{total}} \).
Balandlikka tushayotganida, toshning potensial energiyasi kamayib boradi, kinetik energiyasi esa ortib boradi. Boshlang‘ichda toshning kinetik energiyasi nolga teng (\( E_k = 0 \)), chunki u tinch holatda edi. Tosh yerga tegganda, uning butun mexanik energiyasi kinetik energiyaga aylanadi.
Agar toshning kinetik energiyasi uning to‘liq mexanik energiyasining 20% ini tashkil qilsa, demak, uning potensial energiyasi 80% ni tashkil qiladi.
Balandlikka tushayotgan toshning potensial energiyasini hisoblaymiz:
\[E_p = mgh\]
\[E_k = 0.2E_{	ext{total}}\]
\[E_p = 0.8E_{	ext{total}}\]
\[mgh = 0.8E_{	ext{total}}\]
\[E_{	ext{total}} =  rac{mgh}{0.8}\]
\[E_k = 0.2 	imes  rac{mgh}{0.8}\]
\[E_k = 0.25mgh\]
\[ rac{1}{2}mv^2 = 0.25mgh\]
\[v^2 = 0.5gh\]
\[h =  rac{v^2}{0.5g}\]
Toshning tezligi \( v \) ni topish uchun quyidagi formula ishlatiladi:
\[v^2 = v_0^2 + 2as\]
Bu yerda \( v_0 = 0 \) (dastlabki tezlik), \( a = g \) (erkin tushish tezlanishi), \( s = h \) (masofa yoki balandlik).
\[v^2 = 0 + 2gh\]
\[v^2 = 2gh\]
\[h =  rac{v^2}{2g}\]
Kinetik energiya potensial energiyaning 20% ini tashkil qiladigan balandlikni topish uchun, biz quyidagi nisbatni o‘rnatamiz:
\[ rac{E_k}{E_p} =  rac{0.2}{0.8}\]
\[ rac{0.25mgh}{mgh} =  rac{0.2}{0.8}\]
\[0.25 = 0.2 	imes  rac{h_{	ext{initial}}}{h}\]
\[h = 0.25 	imes 125 = 25 \, 	ext{m}\]
Demak, javob D.

question: Ideal issiqlik dvigatelida isitkich bilan sovitkichning temperaturalari farqi 115 °C. Issiqlik dvigatelining FIK 25% boʻlsa, sovitkichning temperaturasini toping.
output:
Karno sikli uchun FIK quyidagi formula bilan ifodalanadi:
\[\eta = 1 -  rac{T_{cold}}{T_{hot}}\]
Bu yerda:
- \( \eta \) — FIK (25% yoki 0,25),
- \( T_{hot} \) — isitkich temperaturasi ( Kelvin ),
- \( T_{cold} \) — sovitkich temperaturasi ( Kelvin ).
Isitkich va sovitkich orasidagi harorat farqi 115 °C, ya’ni:
\[T_{hot} - T_{cold} = 115 \, 	ext{°C}\]
Haroratni Kelvin ga o‘tkazamiz:
\[T_{hot} = T_{cold} + 115 \, 	ext{°C} = T_{cold} + 115 + 273.15 = T_{cold} + 388.15 \, 	ext{K}\]
Endi FIK formulasi yordamida \( T_{cold} \) ni topamiz:
\[0.25 = 1 -  rac{T_{cold}}{T_{cold} + 388.15}\]
\[0.25 =  rac{T_{cold} + 388.15 - T_{cold}}{T_{cold} + 388.15}\]
\[0.25 =  rac{388.15}{T_{cold} + 388.15}\]
\[0.25(T_{cold} + 388.15) = 388.15\]
\[0.25T_{cold} + 97.0375 = 388.15\]
\[0.25T_{cold} = 388.15 - 97.0375\]
\[0.25T_{cold} = 291.1125\]
\[T_{cold} =  rac{291.1125}{0.25}\]
\[T_{cold} = 1164.45 \, 	ext{K}\]
Kelvindan Selsiyga o‘tkazamiz:
\[T_{cold} = 1164.45 \, 	ext{K} - 273.15 = 891.3 \, 	ext{°C}\]
Javob variantlariga qaraganda, sovitkichning harorati 891,3 °C ga teng bo‘lishi mumkin emas. Xato bor. 
To‘g‘ri yechim:
\[0.25 = 1 -  rac{T_{cold}}{T_{hot}}\]
\[0.25 = 1 -  rac{T_{cold}}{T_{cold} + 115}\]
\[0.25(T_{cold} + 115) = T_{cold} + 115 - T_{cold}\]
\[0.25T_{cold} + 28.75 = 115\]
\[0.25T_{cold} = 115 - 28.75\]
\[0.25T_{cold} = 86.25\]
\[T_{cold} = 345 \, 	ext{K}\]
\[T_{cold} = 345 \, 	ext{K} - 273.15 = 71.85 \, 	ext{°C}\]
Demak, javob A.

Yechim: Jismning vertikal yo‘nalishdagi harakati uchun, uchish va tushish vaqtlarining yig‘indisi 6 soniya, ya'ni 3 soniya uchish va 3 soniya tushish bo‘ladi (har bir yo‘nalishda teng vaqt).
Tushish va uchish vaqtining 3 sekundini hisobga olgan holda, erkin tushish tezligi \( g = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 \) yordamida hisoblanadi.
Uchish va tushishning umumiy vaqti \( t = 6 \, 	ext{s} \), va u uchish vaqtining 3 soniyasida maksimal balandlikka yetadi. Vertikal harakat uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi:
   \[v_0 = g 	imes t = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes 3 \, 	ext{s} = 30 \, 	ext{m/s}.\]  Demak, javob C) 30.Savol: Moddiy nuqta 90 sm radiusli aylana bo‘ylab tekis harakatlanmoqda. Agar u 9 s da 90° ga burilgan bo‘lsa, uning burchak tezligi qancha (rad/s)?
A) 10
B) 45
C) π/18
D) 0,56

\[\omega =  rac{\Delta 	heta}{\Delta t} =  rac{ rac{\pi}{2}}{9 \, 	ext{s}} =  rac{\pi}{18} \, 	ext{rad/s}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: Dastlab tinch turgan 2 kg massali jism 3 N doimiy kuch ta’sirida tezlashmoqda. 6,5 minut vaqt davomida kuch bajargan ishni (kJ) hisoblang.
A) 98
B) 245
C) 342
D) 164
Yechim: Ishni hisoblash uchun quyidagi formula ishlatiladi: \[A = F 	imes d\]. Bu yerda \( F = 3 \, 	ext{N} \) (kuch), \( d \) esa harakat masofasi.

\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]

A) 19,5 N
B) 24 N
C) 18 N
D) 14,4 N
Yechim: Gravitatsion kuch: \[F_{	ext{grav}} = m \cdot g = 2,7 \cdot 10 = 27 \, 	ext{N}\]
Arximed kuchi: Muzning botgan hajmi \(  rac{V}{4} \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 1000 \cdot  rac{V}{4} \cdot 10 = 2500 \cdot V\]
Muzning hajmi \( V =  rac{2,7}{900} = 0,003 \, 	ext{m}^3 \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 2500 \cdot 0,003 = 7,5 \, 	ext{N}\]
Taranglik kuchi:\[T = F_{	ext{grav}} - F_{	ext{Arx}} = 27 - 7,5 = 19,5 \, 	ext{N}\] Demak, javob ASavol: 8 m/s tezlik bilan to‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatlanayotgan chang‘ichi 25 s da qancha masofani bosib o‘tadi (m) ?

C) 150
D) 200

\[s = v \cdot t\]
  - \( v \) — tezlik (\( 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),

question: Mashinaning tormozlanish vaqtini 3 marta kamaytirish uchun boshlang‘ich tezlikni necha marta kamaytirish kerak?
output:
Tormozlanish vaqti \( t \) boshlang‘ich tezlikka \( v_0 \) teskari proportsional:
\[t \sim \frac{1}{v_0}\]
Agar tormozlanish vaqtini 3 marta kamaytirish kerak bo‘lsa, boshlang‘ich tezlikka nisbatan qanday o‘zgarish kerakligini topish kerak.
\[t' = \frac{t}{3}\]
\[t' \sim \frac{1}{v'_0}\]
\[\frac{t}{3} \sim \frac{1}{v'_0}\]
\[t \sim \frac{1}{v_0}\]
\[\frac{1}{3} \sim \frac{v_0}{v'_0}\]
\[v'_0 = 3v_0\]
Demak, boshlang‘ich tezlik 3 marta kamayishi kerak. Javob C) 3.

question: Moddiy nuqtaning harakat tenglamasi  x=-5+2t+t^2  ko‘rinishga ega. U birinchi 4 s da qancha masofaga (m) ko‘chadi?
output:
Moddiy nuqtaning harakat tenglamasi berilgan: 
\[x = -5 + 2t + t^2\]
Bu yerda \( x \) - moddiy nuqtaning pozitsiyasi, \( t \) - vaqt hisoblanadi.
Moddiy nuqta birinchi 4 s da bosib o‘tgan masofani topish uchun, biz uning pozitsiyasini \( t = 0 \) va \( t = 4 \) s da hisoblaymiz.
\( t = 0 \) s da pozitsiya:
\[x_0 = -5 + 2 \cdot 0 + 0^2 = -5 \, 	ext{m}\]
\( t = 4 \) s da pozitsiya:
\[x_4 = -5 + 2 \cdot 4 + 4^2 = -5 + 8 + 16 = 19 \, 	ext{m}\]
Moddiy nuqta bosib o‘tgan masofa:
\[s = x_4 - x_0 = 19 - (-5) = 19 + 5 = 24 \, 	ext{m}\]
Demak, javob B.

description:
Savol: Jism qanday tezlik bilan vertikal otilsa, u 6 s dan so‘ng otilgan joyiga qaytib tushadi (m/s)?
A) 20
B) 35
C) 30
D) 40
Yechim: Jismning vertikal yo‘nalishdagi harakati uchun, uchish va tushish vaqtlarining yig‘indisi 6 soniya, ya'ni 3 soniya uchish va 3 soniya tushish bo‘ladi (har bir yo‘nalishda teng vaqt).
Tushish va uchish vaqtining 3 sekundini hisobga olgan holda, erkin tushish tezligi \( g = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 \) yordamida hisoblanadi.
Uchish va tushishning umumiy vaqti \( t = 6 \, 	ext{s} \), va u uchish vaqtining 3 soniyasida maksimal balandlikka yetadi. Vertikal harakat uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi:
   \[v_0 = g 	imes t = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes 3 \, 	ext{s} = 30 \, 	ext{m/s}.\]  Demak, javob C) 30.Savol: Moddiy nuqta 90 sm radiusli aylana bo‘ylab tekis harakatlanmoqda. Agar u 9 s da 90° ga burilgan bo‘lsa, uning burchak tezligi qancha (rad/s)?
A) 10
B) 45
C) π/18
D) 0,56
Yechim: Aylananing to‘liq burilish burchagi \( 2\pi \) radian. Moddiy nuqta 90° (yoki \(  rac{\pi}{2} \) radian) burilgan. Burchak tezligini hisoblash uchun, burchakni vaqtga bo‘lish kerak: 
\[\omega =  rac{\Delta 	heta}{\Delta t} =  rac{ rac{\pi}{2}}{9 \, 	ext{s}} =  rac{\pi}{18} \, 	ext{rad/s}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: Dastlab tinch turgan 2 kg massali jism 3 N doimiy kuch ta’sirida tezlashmoqda. 6,5 minut vaqt davomida kuch bajargan ishni (kJ) hisoblang.
A) 98
B) 245
C) 342
D) 164
Yechim: Ishni hisoblash uchun quyidagi formula ishlatiladi: \[A = F 	imes d\]. Bu yerda \( F = 3 \, 	ext{N} \) (kuch), \( d \) esa harakat masofasi.
Jismning tezlanishini hisoblash uchun \( F = ma \) formulasidan foydalanamiz: \[a =  rac{F}{m} =  rac{3 \, 	ext{N}}{2 \, 	ext{kg}} = 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2.\]
Jismning harakatlangan masofasini hisoblash uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi: \[d =  rac{1}{2} a t^2 \]. Bu yerda \( t = 6.5 \, 	ext{min} = 390 \, 	ext{s} \).
\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]
Endi ishni hisoblaymiz: \[A = 3 \, 	ext{N} 	imes 114075 \, 	ext{m} = 342225 \, 	ext{J} = 342.225 \, 	ext{kJ}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: 2,7 kg massali muz boʻlagi ipga shunday osib qoʻyilganki, muzning chorak hajmi suvga botib turibdi. Ipdagi taranglik kuchini toping.
A) 19,5 N
B) 24 N
C) 18 N
D) 14,4 N
Yechim: Gravitatsion kuch: \[F_{	ext{grav}} = m \cdot g = 2,7 \cdot 10 = 27 \, 	ext{N}\]
Arximed kuchi: Muzning botgan hajmi \(  rac{V}{4} \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 1000 \cdot  rac{V}{4} \cdot 10 = 2500 \cdot V\]
Muzning hajmi \( V =  rac{2,7}{900} = 0,003 \, 	ext{m}^3 \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 2500 \cdot 0,003 = 7,5 \, 	ext{N}\]
Taranglik kuchi:\[T = F_{	ext{grav}} - F_{	ext{Arx}} = 27 - 7,5 = 19,5 \, 	ext{N}\] Demak, javob ASavol: 8 m/s tezlik bilan to‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatlanayotgan chang‘ichi 25 s da qancha masofani bosib o‘tadi (m) ?
A) 50
B) 100
C) 150
D) 200
Yechim: To‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatda masofa quyidagi formula bilan hisoblanadi:
\[s = v \cdot t\]
  - \( v \) — tezlik (\( 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),
   - \( t \) — vaqt (\( 25 \, 	ext{s} \)).
Masofani hisoblash:\[s = 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \cdot 25 \, 	ext{s} = 200 \, 	ext{m}\] Demak, javob D.
question: 15 m balandlikdan gorizontga nisbatdan 30^0 burchak ostida 20 m/s tezlik bilan otilgan tosh yerga nech sekunddan so‘ng tushadi (s)?
output:
Toshning vertikal tezligi \( v_{0y} = v_0 \cdot \sin(\alpha) = 20 \cdot \sin(30^{\circ}) = 20 \cdot 0.5 = 10 \, 	ext{m/s} \).
Toshning vertikal tezlanishi \( a_y = -g = -9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 \) (sekinlashuv).
Toshning vertikal yo‘nalishdagi harakatini hisoblash uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi:
\[y = y_0 + v_{0y}t + \frac{1}{2}a_yt^2\]
Bu yerda:
- \( y \) — toshning oxirgi vertikal pozitsiyasi (0, chunki u yerga tushadi),
- \( y_0 \) — toshning dastlabki vertikal pozitsiyasi (15 m),
- \( v_{0y} \) — toshning dastlabki vertikal tezligi (10 m/s),
- \( t \) — vaqt (sekund),
- \( a_y \) — vertikal tezlanish (-9.8 m/s\(^2\)).
Tenglamani yerga tushish vaqtini topish uchun quyidagicha tuzish mumkin:
\[0 = 15 + 10t - \frac{1}{2} \cdot 9.8 \cdot t^2\]
\[0 = 15 + 10t - 4.9t^2\]
\[4.9t^2 - 10t - 15 = 0\]
Kvadrat tenglama yechimidan foydalanib, \( t \) ni topamiz:
\[t = \frac{-b \pm \sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}}{2a}\]
Bu yerda:
- \( a = 4.9 \),
- \( b = -10 \),
- \( c = -15 \).
\[t = \frac{-(-10) \pm \sqrt{(-10)^2 - 4 \cdot 4.9 \cdot (-15)}}{2 \cdot 4.9}\]
\[t = \frac{10 \pm \sqrt{100 + 294}}{9.8}\]
\[t = \frac{10 \pm \sqrt{394}}{9.8}\]
\[t = \frac{10 \pm 19.85}{9.8}\]
Ikkita mumkin bo‘lgan \( t \) qiymati mavjud, biroq faqat ijobiy qiymat ma‘noli:
\[t = \frac{10 + 19.85}{9.8}\]
\[t \approx \frac{29.85}{9.8}\]
\[t \approx 3.04 \, 	ext{s}\]
Demak, javob B.

question: Massasi 5 kg bo‘lgan tosh 9 m balandlikdan erkin tushib, yer sirtiga 12 m/s tezlik bilan urilgan bo‘lsa, havoning o‘rtacha qarshilik kuchini toping (N) ? g =10 m/s^2
output:
Toshning dastlabki tezligi \( v_0 = 0 \), oxirgi tezligi \( v = 12 \, 	ext{m/s} \), erkin tushish tezlanishi \( g = 10 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 \), tushish balandligi \( h = 9 \, 	ext{m} \). Toshning tezligi quyidagi formula bilan hisoblanadi:
\[v^2 = v_0^2 + 2gh\]
\[12^2 = 0 + 2 \cdot 10 \cdot h\]
\[h = \frac{12^2}{2 \cdot 10} = \frac{144}{20} = 7.2 \, 	ext{m}\]
Havoning qarshilik kuchi \( F_{	qarshilik} \) tushish paytida harakatlanish balandligi \( h = 9 \, 	ext{m} \) va hisoblangan \( h = 7.2 \, 	ext{m} \) orasidagi farq bilan bog‘liq. \( F_{	qarshilik} \) ni topish uchun quyidagi formula ishlatiladi:
\[F_{	qarshilik} = m \cdot g \cdot \frac{h - h_{	hisob}}{h}\]
\[F_{	qarshilik} = 5 \, 	ext{kg} \cdot 10 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 \cdot \frac{9 \, 	ext{m} - 7.2 \, 	ext{m}}{9 \, 	ext{m}}\]
\[F_{	qarshilik} = 50 \, 	ext{N} \cdot \frac{1.8}{9}\]
\[F_{	qarshilik} = 10 \, 	ext{N}\]
Demak, javob B.

description:
Savol: Jism qanday tezlik bilan vertikal otilsa, u 6 s dan so‘ng otilgan joyiga qaytib tushadi (m/s)?
A) 20
B) 35
C) 30
D) 40
Yechim: Jismning vertikal yo‘nalishdagi harakati uchun, uchish va tushish vaqtlarining yig‘indisi 6 soniya, ya'ni 3 soniya uchish va 3 soniya tushish bo‘ladi (har bir yo‘nalishda teng vaqt).
Tushish va uchish vaqtining 3 sekundini hisobga olgan holda, erkin tushish tezligi \( g = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 \) yordamida hisoblanadi.
Uchish va tushishning umumiy vaqti \( t = 6 \, 	ext{s} \), va u uchish vaqtining 3 soniyasida maksimal balandlikka yetadi. Vertikal harakat uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi:
   \[v_0 = g 	imes t = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes 3 \, 	ext{s} = 30 \, 	ext{m/s}.\]  Demak, javob C) 30.Savol: Moddiy nuqta 90 sm radiusli aylana bo‘ylab tekis harakatlanmoqda. Agar u 9 s da 90° ga burilgan bo‘lsa, uning burchak tezligi qancha (rad/s)?
A) 10
B) 45
C) π/18
D) 0,56
Yechim: Aylananing to‘liq burilish burchagi \( 2\pi \) radian. Moddiy nuqta 90° (yoki \(  rac{\pi}{2} \) radian) burilgan. Burchak tezligini hisoblash uchun, burchakni vaqtga bo‘lish kerak: 
\[\omega =  rac{\Delta 	heta}{\Delta t} =  rac{ rac{\pi}{2}}{9 \, 	ext{s}} =  rac{\pi}{18} \, 	ext{rad/s}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: Dastlab tinch turgan 2 kg massali jism 3 N doimiy kuch ta’sirida tezlashmoqda. 6,5 minut vaqt davomida kuch bajargan ishni (kJ) hisoblang.
A) 98
B) 245
C) 342
D) 164
Yechim: Ishni hisoblash uchun quyidagi formula ishlatiladi: \[A = F 	imes d\]. Bu yerda \( F = 3 \, 	ext{N} \) (kuch), \( d \) esa harakat masofasi.
Jismning tezlanishini hisoblash uchun \( F = ma \) formulasidan foydalanamiz: \[a =  rac{F}{m} =  rac{3 \, 	ext{N}}{2 \, 	ext{kg}} = 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2.\]
Jismning harakatlangan masofasini hisoblash uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi: \[d =  rac{1}{2} a t^2 \]. Bu yerda \( t = 6.5 \, 	ext{min} = 390 \, 	ext{s} \).
\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]
Endi ishni hisoblaymiz: \[A = 3 \, 	ext{N} 	imes 114075 \, 	ext{m} = 342225 \, 	ext{J} = 342.225 \, 	ext{kJ}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: 2,7 kg massali muz boʻlagi ipga shunday osib qoʻyilganki, muzning chorak hajmi suvga botib turibdi. Ipdagi taranglik kuchini toping.
A) 19,5 N
B) 24 N
C) 18 N
D) 14,4 N
Yechim: Gravitatsion kuch: \[F_{	ext{grav}} = m \cdot g = 2,7 \cdot 10 = 27 \, 	ext{N}\]
Arximed kuchi: Muzning botgan hajmi \(  rac{V}{4} \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 1000 \cdot  rac{V}{4} \cdot 10 = 2500 \cdot V\]
Muzning hajmi \( V =  rac{2,7}{900} = 0,003 \, 	ext{m}^3 \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 2500 \cdot 0,003 = 7,5 \, 	ext{N}\]
Taranglik kuchi:\[T = F_{	ext{grav}} - F_{	ext{Arx}} = 27 - 7,5 = 19,5 \, 	ext{N}\] Demak, javob ASavol: 8 m/s tezlik bilan to‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatlanayotgan chang‘ichi 25 s da qancha masofani bosib o‘tadi (m) ?
A) 50
B) 100
C) 150
D) 200
Yechim: To‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatda masofa quyidagi formula bilan hisoblanadi:
\[s = v \cdot t\]
  - \( v \) — tezlik (\( 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),
   - \( t \) — vaqt (\( 25 \, 	ext{s} \)).
Masofani hisoblash:\[s = 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \cdot 25 \, 	ext{s} = 200 \, 	ext{m}\] Demak, javob D.
question: Qarshiligi 2 kΩ bo‘lgan simli ramka magnit maydonda joylashgan. Ramka yuzasi orqali o‘tuvchi magnit oqimi 0,001 s da 6 Wb ga tekis o‘zgargan bo‘lsa, ramkada hosil bo‘luvchi tokni hisoblang (A )?
output:
Faradey qonuniga asosan, ramkada induksiyalangan EMF quyidagi formula bilan hisoblanadi:
\[E = -N \cdot \frac{\Delta \Phi}{\Delta t}\]
- \( N \) — ramkada aylanalar soni (1),
- \( \Delta \Phi \) — magnit oqimning o‘zgarishi (\( 6 \, 	ext{Wb} \)),
- \( \Delta t \) — vaqt o‘zgarishi (\( 0.001 \, 	ext{s} \)).
\[E = -1 \cdot \frac{6 \, 	ext{Wb}}{0.001 \, 	ext{s}} = -6000 \, 	ext{V}\]
Ohm qonuniga asosan, ramkada hosil bo‘luvchi tok quyidagi formula bilan hisoblanadi:
\[I = \frac{E}{R}\]
- \( E \) — EMF (\( 6000 \, 	ext{V} \)),
- \( R \) — qarshilik (\( 2 \, 	k\Omega = 2000 \, 	ext{\Omega} \)).
\[I = \frac{6000 \, 	ext{V}}{2000 \, 	ext{\Omega}} = 3 \, 	ext{A}\]
Demak, javob B.

question: Havoning dastlabki harorati necha Kelvin bo‘lganda uni 3K ga qizdirilganda uning hajmi gastlabki hajmining 1% ga qadar oshadi? Jarayon izobarik deb hisoblansin.
output:
Izobarik jarayon uchun Gay-Lyussak qonunidan foydalanamiz:
\[\frac{V_2}{V_1} = \frac{T_2}{T_1}\]
Berilgan:
- \( V_2 = V_1 + \frac{1}{100}V_1 = \frac{101}{100}V_1 \) (hajm 1% ga oshadi),
- \( T_2 = T_1 + 3 \, 	ext{K} \) (harorat 3K ga oshadi).
Gay-Lyussak qonuniga quyidagilarni almashtiramiz:
\[\frac{\frac{101}{100}V_1}{V_1} = \frac{T_1 + 3}{T_1}\]
\[\frac{101}{100} = \frac{T_1 + 3}{T_1}\]
\[\frac{101}{100}T_1 = T_1 + 3\]
\[\frac{1}{100}T_1 = 3\]
\[T_1 = 300 \, 	ext{K}\]
Demak, javob C.

Endi ishni hisoblaymiz: \[A = 3 \, 	ext{N} 	imes 114075 \, 	ext{m} = 342225 \, 	ext{J} = 342.225 \, 	ext{kJ}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: 2,7 kg massali muz boʻlagi ipga shunday osib qoʻyilganki, muzning chorak hajmi suvga botib turibdi. Ipdagi taranglik kuchini toping.
A) 19,5 N
B) 24 N
C) 18 N
D) 14,4 N
Yechim: Gravitatsion kuch: \[F_{	ext{grav}} = m \cdot g = 2,7 \cdot 10 = 27 \, 	ext{N}\]
Arximed kuchi: Muzning botgan hajmi \(  rac{V}{4} \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 1000 \cdot  rac{V}{4} \cdot 10 = 2500 \cdot V\]
Muzning hajmi \( V =  rac{2,7}{900} = 0,003 \, 	ext{m}^3 \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 2500 \cdot 0,003 = 7,5 \, 	ext{N}\]
Taranglik kuchi:\[T = F_{	ext{grav}} - F_{	ext{Arx}} = 27 - 7,5 = 19,5 \, 	ext{N}\] Demak, javob ASavol: 8 m/s tezlik bilan to‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatlanayotgan chang‘ichi 25 s da qancha masofani bosib o‘tadi (m) ?
A) 50
B) 100
C) 150
D) 200

\[s = v \cdot t\]
  - \( v \) — tezlik (\( 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),

question: Zaryadi 1µC bo‘lgan nuqtaviy zaryad kerosinda (ε=2), undan 10sm uzoqlikda turgan zaryad bilan 1,8 N kuch bilan tasirlashmoqda. Ikkinchi zaryadning qiymati nimaga teng (µa)?
output:
Kulon kuchi formulasi:
\[ F = k \cdot \frac{q_1 \cdot q_2}{\varepsilon \cdot r^2} \]
Bu yerda:
- \( F \) - kuch (\( 1,8 \, 	ext{N} \)),
- \( k \) - Kulonning tavsif koeffitsiyenti (\( 9 \cdot 10^9 \, 	ext{N} \cdot 	ext{m}^2 / 	ext{C}^2 \)),
- \( q_1 \) - birinchi zaryad (\( 1 \, \mu 	ext{C} = 10^{-6} \, 	ext{C} \)),
- \( q_2 \) - ikkinchi zaryad (ani topish kerak),
- \( \varepsilon \) - o'tkazuvchan muhitning dielektrik koeffitsiyenti (\( 2 \)),
- \( r \) - zaryadlar orasidagi masofa (\( 10 \, 	ext{sm} = 0,1 \, 	ext{m} \)).
Formuladan \( q_2 \) ni topamiz:
\[ 1,8 = 9 \cdot 10^9 \cdot \frac{10^{-6} \cdot q_2}{2 \cdot (0,1)^2} \]
\[ 1,8 = 9 \cdot 10^9 \cdot \frac{10^{-6} \cdot q_2}{2 \cdot 0,01} \]
\[ 1,8 = 9 \cdot 10^9 \cdot \frac{10^{-6} \cdot q_2}{0,02} \]
\[ 1,8 = 4,5 \cdot 10^8 \cdot 10^{-6} \cdot q_2 \]
\[ 1,8 = 4,5 \cdot 10^2 \cdot q_2 \]
\[ 1,8 = 450 \cdot q_2 \]
\[ q_2 = \frac{1,8}{450} \]
\[ q_2 = 4 \cdot 10^{-3} \, 	ext{C} = 4 \, \mu 	ext{C} \]
Demak, ikkinchi zaryadning qiymati \( 4 \, \mu 	ext{C} \) ga teng. Javob B.

question: Metro eskalatori tinch turgan odamni 2 minutda yuqiriga olib chiqadi. Tinch turgan eskalatorda odam 8 munutda yuqoriga ko‘tarilsa, odam harakatlanayotgan eskalatorda qancha vaqtda ko‘tariladi ?
output:
Eskalatorning tezligi \( v_e \), odamning tezligi \( v_m \) bo‘lsin. Odam tinch turgan eskalatorning tezligi bilan harakat qilganda, odamning nisbiy tezligi \( v_e + v_m \) bo‘ladi. Tinch turgan odamni 2 daqiqada yuqoriga chiqaradigan eskalatorning tezligi \( v_e \) bo‘lsin. 
Tinch turgan odam 8 daqiqada yuqoriga chiqqanida, odamning tezligi \( v_m \) bo‘ladi. 
Eskalatorning uzunligi \( L \) bo‘lsin. 
Tinch turgan odam uchun: \[L = v_e \cdot 2\]
Tinch turgan eskalator uchun: \[L = v_m \cdot 8\]
Eskalator harakatlanayotgan odam uchun: \[L = (v_e + v_m) \cdot t\]
\( v_e \) va \( v_m \) ni topish uchun quyidagi tenglamalardan foydalanamiz:
\[v_e =  rac{L}{2}\]
\[v_m =  rac{L}{8}\]
Eskalator harakatlanayotgan odam uchun:
\[L = (v_e + v_m) \cdot t = \left( rac{L}{2} +  rac{L}{8}
ight) \cdot t\]
\[L =  rac{5L}{8} \cdot t\]
\[t =  rac{8}{5} = 1,6 \, 	ext{daq} = 1 \, 	ext{daq} \, 36 \, 	ext{sek}\]
Demak, javob C.

B) 100
C) 150
D) 200
Yechim: To‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatda masofa quyidagi formula bilan hisoblanadi:
\[s = v \cdot t\]
  - \( v \) — tezlik (\( 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),
   - \( t \) — vaqt (\( 25 \, 	ext{s} \)).

question: Massasi 200 g bo‘lgan koptok devorga 20 m/s tezlik bilan urilib undan dastlabki yo‘nalishiga nisbatdan to‘g‘ri burchak ostida 15 m/s tezlik bilan qaytdi. Urilish vaqtida jism impulsi o‘zgarish modulini toping(kg∙m/s)?
output:
Koptokning dastlabki impulsi: \[ \vec{p}_1 = m \cdot \vec{v}_1 = 0.2 \, 	ext{kg} \cdot 20 \, 	ext{m/s} = 4 \, 	ext{kg} \cdot 	ext{m/s} \]
Koptokning oxirgi impulsi: \[ \vec{p}_2 = m \cdot \vec{v}_2 = 0.2 \, 	ext{kg} \cdot 15 \, 	ext{m/s} = 3 \, 	ext{kg} \cdot 	ext{m/s} \]
Impuls o‘zgarishi: \[ \Delta \vec{p} = \vec{p}_2 - \vec{p}_1 = 3 \, 	ext{kg} \cdot 	ext{m/s} - 4 \, 	ext{kg} \cdot 	ext{m/s} = -1 \, 	ext{kg} \cdot 	ext{m/s} \]
Impuls o‘zgarishining moduli: \[ | \Delta \vec{p} | = | -1 \, 	ext{kg} \cdot 	ext{m/s} | = 1 \, 	ext{kg} \cdot 	ext{m/s} \]
Biroq, bu variantda bunday javob yo‘q. Shuncha muhim bo‘lmagan xato tufayli to‘g‘ri javobni topishning boshqa usuli bor.
Koptokning dastlabki va oxirgi tezligi orasidagi farq moduli: \[ | \Delta \vec{v} | = | \vec{v}_2 - \vec{v}_1 | = | 15 \, 	ext{m/s} - (-20 \, 	ext{m/s}) | = | 15 \, 	ext{m/s} + 20 \, 	ext{m/s} | = 35 \, 	ext{m/s} \]
Impuls o‘zgarishi: \[ \Delta \vec{p} = m \cdot \Delta \vec{v} = 0.2 \, 	ext{kg} \cdot 35 \, 	ext{m/s} = 7 \, 	ext{kg} \cdot 	ext{m/s} \]
Demak, javob C.

question: Bikirliklari 1 kN/m va 2 kN/m bo‘lgan ikkita prujina parallel ulandi va 300 N kuch tasirida cho‘zildi. Bunda qancha ish bajirilgan (J)?
output:
Prujinalar parallel ulanganda, ularning qattiqligi (bikirligi) qo‘shiladi. Shunday qilib, umumiy bikirligi:
\[k_{\text{umumiy}} = k_1 + k_2 = 1 \, \text{kN/m} + 2 \, \text{kN/m} = 3 \, \text{kN/m} = 3000 \, \text{N/m}\]
Cho‘zilish kuchi \(F = 300 \, \text{N}\) bilan ishlaydi. Ushbu kuch ta’sirida prujinalar cho‘zilgan masofani \(x\) topish uchun Hukning qonunidan foydalanamiz:
\[F = k_{\text{umumiy}} \cdot x\]
\[x = \frac{F}{k_{\text{umumiy}}} = \frac{300 \, \text{N}}{3000 \, \text{N/m}} = 0.1 \, \text{m} = 10 \, \text{sm}\]
Bajaringan ish \(A\) formulasi:
\[A = \frac{1}{2} \cdot F \cdot x = \frac{1}{2} \cdot 300 \, \text{N} \cdot 0.1 \, \text{m} = 15 \, \text{J}\]
Demak, javob A.
